11.title: More Portals

111.content:
(For those who don't know about Azumanga Daioh, information can be found here: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Azumanga_Da... )

Osaka, Tomo, Yomi, and Kagura all sat in Chiyo's room while they waited for Chiyo and Sakaki to return with various party supplies. While the girls would normally be gathered to either study or celebrate Chiyo's birthday, Chiyo thought it would be nice to give Osaka a birthday celebration.

Osaka was slightly spaced out at the moment, thinking about what she normally thinks about, which really could be anything or nothing at all. All of a sudden, she says something. "Ahh...birthdays are nice, even though each one means you're getting older. It would be nice if we could just have the birthday part without the aging part." she says with the kind of smile she usually has on her face after making such a comment.

Before Tomo could agree and make a comment on how staying young would keep Yomi from getting fat, the door opens up to reveal Chiyo and Sakaki with lots of party supplies. "Sorry we're late, everyone, but we ran into Kaorin on the way down here and she wanted to celebrate Osaka's birthday too!" Chiyo says. Sure enough, the girls also see Kaorin with them, though 'celebrating Osaka's birthday' was the last thing on Kaorin's Sakaki-filled mind.

The girls nod as the other three start bringing things in, with Kaorin helping Sakaki carry things in regardless of whether Sakaki actually needed the help.

As the girls are setting up, Osaka gravitates towards an object in the room. Namely, the large air tank they are using to fill the balloons up with. "Ah...you'd think these would be more common." she says while looking at the tank. Chiyo, who had just finished taping some balloons to a corner of the room with Sakaki's help, walks over to the tank and hears Osaka's comment.

"Ah? You mean the air tank? Well, they are very common, actually. Me and Sakaki saw like five at the party supply shop, but they're only rentals. Nobody really needs their own and the ones that do are ones that inflate balloons on a regular basis." Chiyo comments.

Osaka nods. "I see. Well...they remind me of this thing I saw on TV. The thing with the helium...want to watch?"

Chiyo giggles and nods, assuming Osaka means that she was going to use the helium in the tank to make her voice high pitched. "Hehe, sure, go for it. There's plenty of helium in the tank so using a little bit of it wouldn't hurt."

However, what Osaka was thinking about was something she saw on a cartoon show from America. Namely, the character in the show being inflated like a balloon and floating into the air because of the helium. Osaka was determined to do that to herself now that she was presented with the opportunity. Osaka takes the hose in her hand and jams it into her mouth. Chiyo's jaw drops a little as Osaka cranks up the flow on the tank. Nothing really seems to happen for a moment, but after that Osaka's middle begins to bluge out.

One by one the girls stop what they're doing and watch Osaka. Even Kaorin focuses her attention on the inflating girl in the middle of the room. Chiyo, Sakaki, and Kaorin, being the timid girls of the group, look on in shock. Yomi and Kagura simply raise an eyebrow while Tomo looks thrilled.

Tomo's the first to speak up. "Haha! Go Osaka! Show Yomi who's boss!" she shouts, which results with Yomi smacking her upside the head.

The rest of the girls keep quiet until Osaka pulls the hose out of her mouth. Osaka has made herself as wide as she is tall, and now floats a foot off the ground. She smiles in a satsified manner. "Ahh...so this is what it's like to float...very relaxing." She says before giggling a little.

Kagura, Tomo, and Yomi are the first to walk up to the bloated girl. Kagura still has an eyebrow raised while Tomo laughs and pokes Osaka. "So, how exactly do you move around like that?" Kagura asks, noticing that Osaka's arms and legs are nowhere to be found.

Osaka wiggles her feet a bit. "I still have feet, so I bet I could manage a waddle." she replies.

Tomo, meanwhile, has located the tube that Osaka used to inflate herself. She looks over at Chiyo for a moment, who's eyes are still wide at the sight of her best friend filled up and floating like a balloon, and then she looks at the tube itself, wondering if she wanted to inflate herself instead.
111.title: Osaka's Big Birthday

choices: Kaorin jumps in the way at the last moment.
Tomo continues to puff Chiyo up.
1111.content:
With the other girls focused on Osaka, it makes it easy for Tomo to inflate Chiyo. They don't even know she's about to be inflated until they hear a yelp in Chiyo's voice followed by a hissing noise. What they find is Tomo holding the tube in Chiyo's mouth while she gets filled up. Because of her smaller body, she rounds out much faster than Osaka did. Now everyone's attention is on Chiyo, particularly Yomi and Sakaki's.

Yomi is busy trying to wrestle the tube out of Tomo's grasp. Sakaki, however, is looking at the situation from a different persepctive. Now that she's gotten over the shock of watching someone blow up like a balloon, she finds that Chiyo being in the same prediciment is rather cute. This causes Sakaki to blush a little, and she blushes more as she imagines Chiyo swelling up even larger than she is now.

Due to the chaos caused by Tomo and Yomi's fight over the tube Chiyo is being inflated with, no one has noticed that Kaorin is no longer shocked as well. Well, about Chiyo, anyway. What's now gotten her attention is Sakaki's blushing, which she quickly figures is the result of Chiyo inflating. An idea begins to formulate in her head as Tomo has managed to get the hose out of Yomi's grasp at the moment. Tomo prepares to begin inflating Chiyo again, who is too dazed and confused to even realize what is going on.

Tomo grins and lunges at Chiyo...
1111.title: Little Chiyo Becomes a Big Balloon

choices: Chiyo comes out of her daze.
11111.content:
Just moments before the hose would have been stuffed into Chiyo's mouth again, Tomo is caught by surprize when Kaorin runs in between her and Chiyo, which causes the hose to get jammed into her mouth instead. The confusion causes Tomo to let go of the hose. "Eh? Why are you keeping me from inflating Chiyo?" She asks.

Yomi rolls her eyes. "That's not what she's doing." she says as she points to Kaorin, who is now blissfully inflating herself while holding onto the hose.

For some reason or probably no reason at all, this irritates Tomo. "Hey! You're keeping me from forcing people to get big!" she shouts.

Kaorin doesn't seem to notice though, and is paying more attention to Sakaki, who is now looking at her in the same way she was looking at Chiyo. Kaorin couldn't be happier. "Heeeeee...I finally have Sakaki-san's attention! She thinks, only stopping when the tank finally runs out of air. Despite this, Kaorin is rather pleased since she's still bigger than Osaka and Chiyo.

She giggles. "Hehe, what do you think now, Sakaki-san?" Kaorin asks, which makes Sakaki blush furiously. After a few moments, she finds herself being hugged by Sakaki, who's still blushing and now has a smile on her face. Kaorin giggles and hugs back, much to Sakaki's delight, since she gets pushed a little deeper into Kaorin's soft and cuddly body. "How nice..." Sakaki says as she gently rubs Kaorin's sides, which greatly pleases Kaorin.

Tomo grumbles a little as she holds the hose in her hand. "Now how am I going to force people to bloat up?" she asks, while Yomi slaps her hand against her own forehead while sighing. "You won't." Yomi replies.

"Too bad, I was going to make you big next." Tomo says with a frown.

"Don't involve me in this!" Yomi shouts.

Tomo grins. "It's not like anyone would notice." she says, which causes Yomi to lunge at Tomo, which in turn causes the two of them to wrestle with each other.

Then...
11111.title: Getting Big for a Big Girl.

choices: Tomo lets Kaorin go for it.
Tomo had someone else in mind...
111111.content:
Chiyo finally gets her mind together and starts to properly take in the situation. "This is just...weird..." Chiyo says as she pokes her puffy body. "How is this even possible?"

"It is possible because we are puffable." Osaka says, with her trademark grin on her face.

Chiyo sweatdrops. "Right...well, let's worry about that later. We have a bigger problem right now: Namely, there's not much room in here because of our size." she explains.

Indeed, there's only around a 2-3 foot wide space left in the room, with Yomi, Tomo, and Kagura occupying the whole space. Sakaki is content with clinging to Kaorin and occupying the small space between the three puffed-up girls.

Tomo laughs. "Let's knock out the roof and let 'em float out!" she says, which causes everyone but Sakaki and Kaorin to sweatdrop. Sakaki and Kaorin instead blush at the thought, imagining themselves floating away together.

"Maybe we should do something that DOESN'T involve destroying Chiyo's house or sending our friends into the upper atmosphere." Yomi says.

"I didn't say we wouldn't tie them down first..." Tomo mutters as Chiyo begins to speak. "Yeah...maybe we can try to deflate first. I doubt we'd be able to squeeze ourselves out through the windows at the size we are, but even if all we could do was make ourselves somewhat smaller, we'd have a chance of getting out of this room and trying to figure out what to do from there." Chiyo explains.

Tomo is silent for a moment. "How about just taking out the wall instead?" she eventually suggests.

Yomi sighs. "Can you think of something that wouldn't be a last resort?"

"I don't see you thinking of anything!" Tomo exclaims, laughing a bit. "Besides, with you around I'm sure we'd have no trouble taking out a wall!" Yomi looks very irritated for a moment, but calms down.

"...anyway, let's see what we can do." Yomi says, as she, Tomo, and Kagura start by attempting to force the air out of Osaka by squeezing her. They keep trying until they realize that they'd end up popping her before the would ever be able to force any air out of her.

"That was a nice hug." Osaka says, giggling.

Tomo chuckles a little from what Osaka said. "So...now can we knock out a wall or two?"

Chiyo sighs. "If that's the only way to get out of here, then I guess we have no choice."

Tomo laughs. "Haha, alright. I have just the thing, too!" she says as she runs off.

"God, I hope she doesn't have something excessive in mind." Yomi says.

Tomo soon comes back with another helium tank. "Alright, so my idea is that one of us will be inflated to the point of making the wall burst out due to the pressure! Any questions?"

Kaorin jumps at the opportunity to make herself bigger. "Ooh, I'll be that girl!" she exclaims excitedly.
111111.title: Time for a plan.

choices: Yomi really does want to be fat.
Yomi doesn't really want to be fat.
1112.content:
"Heh, my turn!" Tomo exclaims as she jams the hose into her mouth and turns the nozzle on the tank to full blast. Yomi and Kagura let out quick shouts and back off as Tomo's body fills up very quickly. She grins around the hose as her hands are forced off of it, as if she's thrilled that she'll only stop inflating when there's no more helium in the tank.

When the tank actually does run out of helium, Tomo looks a little disappointed, dispite that she's inflated even bigger than Osaka. She's so big that her head would still be touching the ceiling regardless of whether she was actually floating or not. "Hehe, now there's no denying that I'm the best when it comes to puffyness!" Tomo says, with a wide grin on her face.

Chiyo, Kaorin, and Sakaki are still shocked, although it seems that Tomo inflating herself only shocked them to the point of them being as shocked as they where when they first saw Osaka inflate herself.

Yomi grins a little as she pokes Tomo a little. "Hehe, what an ironic situation we have here."

"It's not ironic at all. I'm just big and puffy, and besides, I don't care. You're the one who has an inner fatty waiting to bust loose and gorge herself until she's as fat as I am puffed!"

Yomi blinks for a moment. For the first time ever, Tomo making a comment about her weight didn't make her want to hurt Tomo. She was just silent.

"Come on, all that consern over your weight is just to keep yourself from thinking that deep down inside you want to get as fat as possible!" Tomo says, not realizing what she is saying might just be true.
1112.title: Tremendous Tomo

choices: Yomi likes Tomo as a puffy girl.
Yomi would like Tomo more as a plump girl.
11121.content:
Yomi still stands still, not sure of what to think for a moment. Then, she suddenly grins. "Wow...you're actually right about something, Tomo."

Tomo blinks. "I...you mean you really do want to make yourself fat!?"

"Yay. Thanks to Tomo, Yomi had a breakthrough." Osaka says.

Yomi chuckles. "While I'm sure Tomo was just being her usual self, seeing her and you puffed before she started going on about me wanting to be fat probably made me realize that I might actually look really good if I was extremely fat."

"You...you really mean that!? I mean, you're not just trying to lead me on so you can get back at me, right?" Tomo asks, still surprized.

"I'm really not joking, Tomo. Why are you asking so much? Does the thought of me really wanting to be fat turn you on or something?" Yomi asks, halfway expecting Tomo to say something to the effect of 'Yes'.

Tomo looks at Yomi for a moment, before grinning. "...damn straight!"

Yomi grins as she walks over to Tomo and hugs her as much as she can. "So I take it that calling me fat will be sweet talk from now on, right?"

Tomo nods. "Yeah...hehe, so does this mean that me being puffy is a turn on for you, or what?"
11121.title: Yomi's Confession.

111212.content:
"Well, I like the shape, but I'd be more turned on by you if you were fat too." Yomi says, rubbing at Tomo a little.

Tomo grins. "Hehe, say no more, Yomi. Together, we'll fatten outselves until we're the fattest girls around!"

Yomi climbs up to Tomo's head and kisses her on the lips for a moment. "Hehehe...fattest around, huh...I look forward to it."

"So, how about we hit every resturant in town for our first date?" Tomo asks.

Yomi shakes her head. "Every buffet in town would be much better for our waistlines."

Tomo chuckles. "Right on, Yomi! You really are a fatty on the inside!"

"Yes, now let's hurry and get like that on the outside, too." Yomi says.

Osaka grins. "Have a good time, kids!"

"Well, I'm guessing your moment is probably over, so I guess I should try to remind you probably won't be able to get Tomo out of the room." notes Kagura.

Chiyo, Sakaki, and Kaorin, one by one, recover from their shock.

"The last thing I remember was Tomo bloating herself up...can someone tell me what is going on?" Chiyo says.

"Yomi admitted that she wanted to get really fat and she and Tomo will work on getting fat together as soon as they find a way to get out of here."

Chiyo blinks. "Wow, that's weird...but who am I to judge. I hope you two have a good time!"

"I already said that!" Osaka happily exclaims.

Kaorin and Sakaki don't have much to say, but they seem happy for Tomo and Yomi.

Tomo grins. "Hehe, awesome. Now, let's see...maybe I could get all this helium out of me if I burped?"

"It's worth a shot." Yomi says, as she grabs a soda gets Tomo to drink it. Within moments, Tomo lets out a tremendous belch that is actually strong enough to tear a whole through Chiyo's ceiling.

Tomo, now back to normal, laughs a bit. "Hehe, sorry about that, Chiyo-chan!"

Yomi sighs. "Well, we should help fix Chiyo-chan's roof."

"Don't worry about it. I'll get the roof fixed later. You two just have fun." Chiyo says.

Tomo grins. "Hehe, alright. Come on, Yomi. We've got weight to gain!"

"I'm looking forward to it." says Yomi. She and Tomo wave to the others as the leave.

Osaka grins again. "Have a good time, kids!"

"Well, now what?" asks Chiyo.
111212.title: Tomo's going to get fat, too!

choices: They come across a special buffet.
They find someone peddling instant fattening pills.
1112121.content:
"So...what do you want to start off with, Yomi?" Tomo asks.

Yomi just shrugs. "I'm not even sure if eating would be the best way to get fat...I mean, sure, it'd work, but there's probably a faster way to get ourselves really fat, right?"

This makes Tomo stop and think for a moment. "Well, that's true. I don't just want to get fat! I want to get fat now!" She exclaims. "But how are we going to manage that? Even stuff that helps you get heavier requires metabolism...hrum...I guess we might be stuck doing it the old fashioned way."

The girls walk along as they think about their situation, hoping they'll come across something that'll quickly make them fat.
1112121.title: When Eating isn't fast enough.

choices: Only go for a somewhat city-friendly size.
Head out to the country side and go all the way.
11121212.content:
The girls come across a slightly older girl sitting at a stand with the words 'Instant Fat Supplement' written in Japanese. The girl has brown hair, a regular build, and is wearing an orange tie-dye t-shirt and regular jeans. "Say, I bet that's what we need, Yomi!" Tomo exlaims after reading the sign.

"Oh, you two looking to make yourselfs really fat or something? Hehe, you've come to the right stand, then. Just one of these pills will fatten you up with around a cubic foot worth of fat." says the girl.

Tomo and Yomi are silent for a bit.

"...that'd be around 35 centimeters. I think a meter would be like three point something here, right?"

Yomo and Yomi shrug. "I guess that works out." Yomi says. "But do these actually do what they say?"

The girl grins and hands Tomo and Yomi a pill. "See for yourselves. You'll find the fat you gain really will be instant."

They both take the pills, and sure enough, less than a second after they swallow, their midsections quickly bluge out with soft, squishy fat. The girl giggles. "So, will that be a deal?"

Needless to say, the girl managed to sell her whole supply to Tomo and Yomi.

-----

A little later, the Yomi looks over the bottles. "Well, at least we don't have to worry about the fat wearing off or anything, and plus it doesn't have any negative impact on the body..." Yomi says as she reads from the bottle.

Tomo laughs. "Hehe, so that means no heart failure for these two fatties!"

Yomi nods, and keeps looking for anything of particular interest. "Let's see...there's at least 250 pills per bottle, and she had like 20, so that's 5000 pills all together."

Tomo grins. "So 2500 feet between the two of us...what exactly would that mean?"

"It means that we'd flatten a decent-sized chunk of the city, which is why we're not taking all 2500 pills while we're in the city." Yomi explains. "So..."
11121212.title: Bloaty Pills

choices: They'll become the first fat girls to be lighter-than-air.
111212122.content:
"Hey, we're going to end up polishing off the bottles anyway. Let's just cut to the chase, find some wide, open spaces, and go for broke." Tomo suggests, with a huge grin on her face.

Yomi shrugs. "Heh, alright then. I guess we should just get it over with." she says, as the pair makes their way out into the outskirts of the city."

"This is it, Yomi. Take a few moments to reflect on what it's like to be skinny, because we'll never be that way again." Tomo says.

Yomi laughs. "We've had 17 years for that, Tomo. I doubt that not waiting a few more moments will make us regret this." She says, as she picks up one of the large jars they got to hold each share of pills. Tomo does the same and they start dumping the contents into their mouths at the same time. In a second, the girls go from 4 feet tall to 100 feet wide, and the rate pretty much remains the same, with the girls ending up 2500 wide in less than half a minute. Dispite being filled with fat, the girls appear to be completely round. The girls are positioned so that they're heads are right next to each other and so that their bodies are comfortably squished next to each other.

"Now see, isn't this better than just gradually bloating ourselves?" asks Tomo.

Yomi contentedly sighs. "It's a little harder to adjust to the sudden change in size, but once you do it feels extremely nice."

"Mmm...yeah. It's kinda like when I was puffed up, only instead of air it's lots and lots of squishy fat." Tomo says, as she gets cozy next to Yomi. "I feel a lot lighter than I expected too...hehe..."

Yomi nods. "Yeah, let's like we have the softness of being fat with the shape and lightness of being puffy."

"The best of both worlds!" Tomo exclaims. "Woudln't it be interesting if we were fat and ligther than air?"

Yomi nods. "Yeah, it would...but would it even be possible to get that light while still being fat?"
111212122.title: Puffy Fatties.

1131.title: Who exactly?

choices: A series of air pumps and tanks
11312.content:
This might help explain a few of the characters.
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Characters_...

It was a day of spring cleaning. In the center entrance room were Shinobu, Kaolla and Sarah. They were all finishing up polishing the tables.

Short blue-haired Shinobu had to wipe off some dust from her new pink sweater, then finished flapping off the rest of the dust from her red fuku mini-skirt.

Kaolla looked readily dressed for her school except that she wasn't wearing shoes. Instead, she was using her feet to skate around the room while her feet were riding wet rags that cleaned up the floor.

And Sarah who was wearing a cute purple dress watched as everybody else was cleaning up.

All of the sudden Sarah heard the door knock. She approached and open the front door to find nobody but a package. Shinobu and Kaolla walked over too and they opened the box together to find inside it-
11312.title: Knock! Knock!

choices: Herself blowing up like a balloon
113122.content:
Kaolla- Wow! Those cupcakes sure look delicious!

Shinobu decided to eat one of them. She finished it in a couple of bites. She then smiled with satisfaction.

Shinobu- That was very good for taste. I wonder who baked them?

Sarah- Kind to think of it who would give them to us?

All of the sudden, Shinobu felt a little strain in her gut. She looked down to find-
113122.title: Sweet Cupcakes

choices: Kaolla Su and Sarah duke it out.
Naru walks in during the contest.
1131221.content:
As the cupcake hit the bottom of her belly and began to disolve, Shinobu noticed that as she put her hands on her sides that her belly had become wider, but not truly pushed further out.

"I guess i'm just growing up, that's all." Shinobu said to herself with a nod.

"Hey, Shinobu, these are pretty good." said Kaolla Su downing two of them. With the last sylable pronouced of good, Kaolla Su's belly bulged outward just enough to keep her dress and shirt from even touching in front of her with the knot she kept tied in the back.

"Kaolla, are you playing a game?" Sarah asked, wondering how/why Kaolla's belly was so full.

"Yeah, i'm playing a game, see who can push out their belly the furthest." Kaolla announced as she patted her sides.

"Alright, let's start...wait i'll be back in a minute, haven't gotten anything to eat all day." Sarah said, leaving the room with five or six cupcakes on a plate, heading for the kitchen.

"Shinobu, you're up first." Kaolla Su said with a grin. Shinobu pulled her shirt up a bit, right below her bra, and revealed a pretty normal belly with only a few "new" curves. She started sucking in a slight bit of air and pushing with a good deal of effort, her belly reached the size of half a decent sized soccerball.

"Not bad!" Shinobu exclaimed, "yet it's my turn next, victory shall be mine! She planted her feet in a determined fashion and stared at her belly. With a ratchet like recoil she threw her legs forward and began to push forward on her belly. In a matter of minutes her belly resembled that of an entire basketball.

"Yeah, i've got you beat!" Su said with a cheer.

"...but you haven't seen me yet," Sarah said storming in. Her body looked even skinnier than usual, this was very odd indeed. With a burst of air Sarah opened her mouth and a jet stream of air poured into her belly making it tight and restraining. She wasn't done there, her sheer size was increasing, soon her girlish figure was enhanced to the point where voluptious was an understatement. In only 6 minutes time, her belly went from a size 2 to a size 26 and at that size she looked like herself...but extremely puffy as it were.

"I concede, this power is too strong." Shinobu said with a defeated hunch to her back.

"I'll fight you for the title, don't you know? These cupcakes that Kitsune bought make you feel and act like a balloon for a good amount of time, but she did warn of some side affects," Kaolla Su said coyly.

"Oh, so that's my problem..." Sarah said in a pretending to be ditsy voice.
1131221.title: A sure fire contest.

choices: They begin to pull in objects like vacuum cleaners.
11312211.content:
Kaolla eats three more cupcakes in order to match up with the ones Sarah ate. "There, now let's see just who can get bigger." she says, as she suddenly takes a deep breath that causes her middle to bulge out.

"Hey, no fair!" Sarah says, as she takes a deep breath as well. Shinobu blinks and watches on as Kaolla and Sarah begin to swell up faster than they did before. "Wow...they're really going at it...but I wonder what that side effect was..." she thinks as the two girls continue to get bigger.
11312211.title: Side Effects?

choices: The girls get exhausted right before Shinobu is sucked in.
Shinobu ends up in one of the girls.
113122112.content:
Oddly enough, Kaolla and Sarah manage to keep breathing in deeply. Shinobu looks around and notices that the furnature has moved closer to the pair of expanding girls. By now, both girls are twice as wide as they are tall, and their mouths are open so widely that a person could easily fit inside. This is very unsettling to Shinobu, and she is even further unnerved when she realizes that she is being pulled towards them.

"Wh-whoa! Hey, girls, stop!" She shouts as she holds on to something sturdy. However, the girls are unable to hear Shinobu as she begins to lose her grip. Shinobu shuts her eyes as she prepares to end up in one of the girl's bellies.
113122112.title: Girl Suction Action

choices: Shinobu convinces them to do something else.
The girls ignore her and go on with their plan.
1131221121.content:
Without warning, Kaolla and Sarah suddenly stop breathing in and look around, first at themselves and then at the room. "Wow...it looks like we did a lot of damage..." Kaolla says. Sarah nods and looks over at Shinobu, who is still clutching on to a beam for dear life. "Hey, what's her problem?" Sarah says as she points to Shinobu.

Kaolla sweatdrops. "Oh my...were we really causing that much suction? Interesting...we're like human vacumm cleaners!"

Shinobu stops shaking when she hears their voices. "Wha- Oh! You stopped. I was worried I'd get gulped down by one of you...wow. You two got huge!" She says, noticing that the girls are so wide that they are almost touching the ceiling.

Sarah rubs the back of her head. "Hehe. I guess we don't know our own strength!" she says.

"Or lung capacity, for that matter." Shinobu replies.

Kaolla giggles. "Funny you should mention that! You see...we didn't get tired because we couldn't hold anymore...we just got physically tired!"

Shinobu sweatdrops. "Huh...so..."

For a moment, all three of them are silent. But soon enough, Kaolla gets a grin on her face. "Hehe, I bet if I kept this up I could gulp down the whole world! I mean, we did almost eat up Shinobu, so I suppose that it would be no problem to also eat up very large objects!"

"Yeah! And then the universe!" Sarah exclaims gleefully. "And since we're full of air, I'm sure everyone will be just fine."

Shinobu's jaw drops as she realizes that they're not kidding. "Wait, you can't do that. I'm not really sure it works that way!"
1131221121.title: Appetite for Everything.

choices: Maybe we should try another cupcake
Let's hide in Shinobu's room first
1131222.content:
Shinobu was shocked to see herself suddenly expanding in all area of her body. Kaolla and Sarah watched as she grew bigger and bigger until she finally stopped. Shinobu ended up looking like she had been incredibly stuffed throughout her body (Belly, Legs, arms). She was around 7 feet tall now, and her center was round as any ball. Her thighs plumped up so much yet she could still stand with them. And her arms could barely move because they stuck out so thick that she could hardly even bend them.

Shinobu- What happened to me!?

*FWOSH!!!*

As soon as you enter the strange portal, you feel how your body get's lighter and, when you finally dare to open your eyes, you finally see where you are.

"HOLLY SH---!!!"

You're flying trought a tube, it's walls made out of the same gooey stuff the portal was made of, straight to the other corner end of it. A blinding white light is on the other end, and just gets brighter and brighter as you get close to it.

You kick, you strike, you try to get a hold or something, but you just can't. You have no control of direction watsoever, and the light is almost blinding you.

Finally, you just can't keep your eyes opened anymore. You close your eyes, but that light practially traspases your eyelids and your eyes are burning.

"ARGH"

You try to move desesperately while putting your palms over you eyes, and the last thing you last hear is a bizarre "WOOSH!!!"

Then, it all changes. You start to feel the airbreeze in both your clothes and hair, and the sun's heat invading ya'. Werever you are, it has one hell of a weather.

Finally, you open your eyes...

"CRASH!!!"

You crash with a big, hard window in the third floor of a big house. The window only cracks slightly, but you, on the other hand, crashed full-on with that thing.

All your body hurts, and then it hits you...

"I felt so good because I was FUC--- FLYING!!! CR--!!!"

But then something else hits ya'

"Who's... who's that girl???"

That explained it all. The girl you were watching in that portal was Tiffany Lords from Rival Schools. No doubt about it. You thought that you were supposed to land were you saw in the portal, and after that you finally realize that the portal wasn't lying (if that's possible): You landed in the window in front of her, the EXACT picture the portal was showing.

You were so busy checking Tiffany's great chest you actually didn't noticed the window the portal was showing too.

Right now, Tiffany's just like in the portal. Well... sort of. She trowed the Teddy Bear in surprise shortly after you crashed, and now, her expression was on of extreme surprise.

Her breasts... covered by a fugly shirt... damn

AND, after all that, something else hits you.

"Wait... last time I checked, I wasn't Spider Man"

And right you are. You aren't.

"WOOOOOAH!!!!!"

You fall, and you don't know if that scream is either yours of hers (if it's her, she's VERY damn loud).

The air that felt so wonderful in the past now just feels like if it was mockering you as you pummel to the floor at an amazing speed.

You don't have a chance.

WHAM!!!

You fall on hte ground straight on your back and the back of you head. You THINK you fell "in" something, but you're not sure, and it really doesn't matter right now...

Blood flows from your nose. You can't see it, but, hell, you can feel it.

After hardly 1 second, you completelly loose contince.

Now...

131.content:
Rogue had been searching for hours.

The other day, she had heard of a priceless gem, a sapphire, in an underground cavern. From what she could gather, the stone was from a civilization predating known history. When the civilization collapsed, the stone was hidden away to prevent thieves from taking the stone.

The name of the gem was "Windstone." It was said to have power over air and was created by a powerful wizard as a gift to his wife, as she always loved the summer breezes.

Sadly, the wizard's wife died before she received the stone. She was buried not too far from their house, so the wizard left it at her grave. He also put a curse on it, so that no one could steal it as long as the grave existed. Rogue reasoned that the stone was picked up when the civilization ended.

-----

"Where is that stupid rock?" Rogue asked herself. She had been searching at the presumed site too long for her liking. Finally, she found a hidden passage in a crack in the cavern wall. Squeezing through, Rogue walked to the center of the room. And there, on a little stand, lay the Windstone.

"So there you are." Rogue said, now pleased. The sapphire wasn't too large, just large enough to be a handful, but it was very beautiful. Rogue just picked it up and left the cavern.

-----

Well that was easy. Rogue thought once she got outside. She was feeling quite good; usually her searches don't go nearly this well.

Rogue started to wonder what she would do with the stone. She thought about using it in a necklace. So, she placed it on her chest and began to look for a pond to catch her reflection on.

But, no sooner then she started looking, Rogue felt a strange tingling within her body.

It all began when Princess Sally decided to take a walk through the Great Forest. She occasionally needed some time to herself, so she sometimes took a walk every so often to clear her head. The walk was uneventful until Sally accidentally kicked something in the path.

"Hmm? What do we have here?" Sally uttered, bending over to pick up the object.

It was small metal container, measuring 6x6 and two inches thick. It was sealed by a small clasp. Sally opened it up the container.

One side of the container were two sheets of thirty-six capsules, the other had one extra capsule, and two folded pieces of paper. One was labeled "map." The other paper wasn't labeled. Sally read the unlabeled paper first. It was some type of shortened lab report.

"Genetic enhancement capsule. Dermal strength increase by ten. Unsolvable side effect: dermal elasticity increase by ten, eventual spread to whole body." Sally scanned. She put the paper back and took the map out.

-----

After following the map, Sally found herself at a cave somewhere in the middle of the forest. The mouth of the cave was sealed off by a door with an old, computerized lock. In took a minute for Nicole, Sally's minicomputer, to pick said lock.

I wonder why this place wasn't marked on the maps at Knothole. Sally thought.

-----

Once inside, Sally followed a path into a large hangar of some sort. There were also numerous gas tanks, as well as hoses, even numerous valves, which probably accessed a water source.

A smile crept up across Sally's face. She took out the lab report again and read the whole thing. She always wanted a talent that was unique to herself.

From what she read, who ever swallowed a capsule would have the ability to inflate themselves for one week, as well as more resilient flesh. There were a few problems though. If a person took more than one capsule per day, they risked they change being permanent. Also, each new capsule multiplied the effect of the previous capsule. The maximum number of pills that could be taken with guaranteeing permanent change was four.

-----

After downing five capsules, Sally walked to a tank of oxygen, connected a hose, and put the free end into her mouth...

"Amazing." Sally said aloud as she closed the valve. She felt so good, so... full. Now she wanted more. The only question was how to fill up; inflate her belly even more, or try and fill her whole body?

"Well, I can wait a little while for the water." Said Sally as she waddled to another tank.

With some careful movement, Sally grabbed the nozzle. It was at this point that Sally realized something: she was too big to put the hose into her navel.

"Great." She mumbled. "Now what?"

"Do you require assistance?" A monotone voice asked.

Sally looked down, as best, she could, and saw a small, capsule shaped, hover-robot. It was colored a dull silver, with a light blue visor to see with. It's arms were connected by ball joints, with a simple pincher at the wrists.

"Do you require assistance?" The robot asked again.

A big smile formed on Sally's face. "Yes. Yes I do require assistance. I'm not able to insert this nozzle into my body." she displayed the nozzle. "Could you do it for me?"

"Command acknowledged." The robot said, taking the nozzle from Sally's hand. After plugging it in, the robot levitated itself in front of Sally's face.

"Any further assistance?"

"Turn the air tank on. And make sure it's all the way on." Sally ordered. She was so anxious to fill up even further.

The robot followed the princess's command. Sally doubled in size.

"Thank you." Sally cooed.

"Would you like to continue?" The robot asked.

Sally thought about it. "No, I think I'll wait for a few minutes."

"Command acknowledged." The robot said. "Would you like to alter the tank setup?"

"Alter? How?" Sally asked.

The robot gestured to the other tanks. "I can set up the air tanks to open simultaneously, and to vent through a single hose into you." The robot answered. "Do you wish to alter the setup?"
1351222.title: Hey little buddy!

13512221.content:
"H-How many tanks are there?" Sally asked.

"Counting the two that have been used, twenty." The robot answered.

Sally's widened faster than her body. "Twenty?"

The robot simply said 'yes' in response. Simple multiplication led Sally to the conclusion she could grow up to ten times her current size. There was only one problem; there wasn't enough room in the hangar.

"No thanks." Sally replied. "As tempting as it is, I won't be able to fit inside here."

"Incorrect." The robot said. "The flooring and walls in this facility are movable. If you are willing to wait, this facility can become large enough for your needs."

Sally was stunned for a moment. "Well, I suppose you can open this place up."

"Understood." The robot said. It transmitted the proper command to the central computer, and the restructuring began.

=====

It took the better part of five minutes before Sally had the space she wanted. She was awed by the fact that something as big as the hangar was built so discreetly in the Great Forest. As she waddled over to the spot where she would inflate, she looked at the network of hoses and tanks that the robot had set up.

The tanks were connected by normal hoses, which connected to air pumps, and finally to the main hose that would put it all into Sally. The main hose, which was ten time larger than the others, was plugged into Sally's navel.

"All remaining 18 tanks are ready for use." The robot answered. "Do you wish to continue?"

"Yes." Sally answered. She was simultaneously eager and scared over how big she would be.

The robot began turning the valves on the tanks, releasing the air. However, the main hose was still blocked off- Sally knew that once the ever-so-helpful drone turned THAT valve, all the air contained in the eighteen tanks would go inside her.

[I hope I can handle it all...] she thought to herself.

The robot finished opening the eighteen valves, then it went to the main valve and opened it all the way. All of the air rushed into Sally; within seconds, she had inflated to twice her size, then three times her size... in under a minute, she was nearly 300 feet wide. Her expanding body had consumed her limbs and head, leaving her in the shape of a perfect ball with a small face. Her clothes were bursting at the seams, threatening to rip off completely. Her skin was stretched to the limit.

[Wow!! I'm huge!!] Sally thought.

The robot used it's boosters to fly up to her face.

"The air tanks are empty," it said. "How may I be of assistance now?"

Sally pondered the question.

"Bring me more tanks!" She says, the robot looked at her "I don't think that would be wise, your body is nearing it's limit. Anymore and you could burst". Sally didn't pay any attention to what the robot said "I don't care....I want to be the biggest blimp ever" She smiled wyedly "Yes...The biggest ever!" The robot then lew down and began brining more tanks. After a couple of minutes he brought 10 more tanks an attached them to main hose. Sally's eye's sparkeled with happynes, as she looked at the tanks. The robot then flew up, and looked at her "10 last tanks are attached, do you want to proceed?" Sally smiled an purred "Yes...." The robot flew down an turned the tanks on. Sally felt tha she began to expand eevn bigger, she moaned an purred from the pleasure, as her head,legs an hands sank even deeper

*Riiip* Just then her clothes ripped and feel on the ground, but Sally didn't care she was to lost in her pleasure "Yes.....Bigger.....Bigger......Bigger.....Keep growing...." Her body kept growing and growing. When it reached it became 1,0000 wyde, she began to feel herselfe rumbel an pulsate, but she still kept purring "Bigger......Keep growing......I'm a blimp.....I'M THE BIGGEST BLIMP EVER!!!!" just then her head finnaly sinked in, making her a comepletly round ball
1351222111.title: Make me bigger

13512221111.content:
'I'm the biggest blimp ever...' Sally thought to herself from within her blimp like body. She rumbled and pulsated, but she still grew. And Sally was in pure bliss. Then...

BOOM!!!

Sally's large form exploded is a dazzling pop, shaking the whole forest, right down to Knothole. Everyone heard and felt the blast and ran around the forest, trying to figure out what made the sound. But all they could find was a large warehouse with a large brown piece of rubber with a hole in it. The rubber was to big to look at, but they just assumed someone left the air going on a giant blimp.

They could say one thing, though. It had to have been the biggest blimp in the world.

No one knew what ever happened to Sally. But, she was happy. For some reason, they knew that.
13512221111.title: The End of Sally

choices: She get's lost in her pleasure
1352.content:
Sally slowly opened the valve on the oxygen tank, allowing the gas inside to slowly spread throughout her body.

First, Sally felt her stomach go taut as it began to inflate. It felt so full since her body wasn't used to stretching out. It didn't hurt, due to the pills, but she felt very full and tight. As her new pot belly grew bigger, it felt ever so much tighter. She was starting to get lost in all the new sensations she was feeling.

Than, she felt a new sensation coming from her bottom. Sally placed a hand on her butt and realized the oxygen was filling out the rest of her body. Her butt, and thighs, began to grow larger with each passing moment. Sally had to adjust her stance to allow her legs to allow her legs to inflate properly. It was harder to maintain her concentration now with more of her body inflating.

Than Sally felt a sudden firmness coming from her chest. She cupped her bosom with both hands as her breasts began to inflate. As they grew rounder and larger, Sally's breasts began to block her view. Her concentration was very hindered now.

Sally paused and tried to look herself over. Her belly, butt, and breasts had blown up like balloons, becoming sphere like. She felt unbelievably taut, and at the same time, content.

I think I should stop for right now. Sally thought. But I don't want to really stop. She took hold of the valve for the tank, and...
1352.title: Blimped

choices: You see the Final Fantasy IX world...
14.content: You see more portals and another door...
14.title: Portal Room Left (1)

141.content:
Eiko was wandering around Alexandria Castle one day, trying to find Dagger. "I know it's not like a lady to fight dirty, but as they say, all's fair in love and war." she says, trying to convince herself that what she was about to do was a good idea.

Soon, she manages to get close to Dagger's chamber, but standing right in front of the door was Stiener. "Oh dear, if I try my plan while he's around, he'll proabally wind up killing me." Eiko thinks to herself. Then she get's an idea. "Stiener!" she yells.

Stiener looks at Eiko. "Can't you see I'm guarding the queen? Would you mind bothering me some other time?" He said, with a huff.

"But...there's some kids defacing the castle walls!" Eiko says, but Stiener only stands there. "So? I'm sure another guard will take care of it. Now leave me be!"

Eiko thinks for a second, then gives it one last try. "The other guards said they were going on break." Stiener's face suddenly got very red. "How dare they? Going on break when they are to be at their posts! I'm going to have to straighen them out!" he says, before stomping off, completely forgeting about his duty.

"Ok, now, part 2 of my plan to win Zidane's heart." Eiko said. She crept into the Queen's Quarter's, and fortunately for Eiko, she was fast asleep at the time. Eiko goes though a small spell book, until she finds the spell she wants.

"Hum...this spell should do the trick." she says, looking at a page that has "Balloon" at the top in big bold letters. She says a few magic words, then casts the spell.
141.title: Mischievious Little Eiko.

1411.content:
Soon, a hissing sound begins to come from Dagger as she starts to inflate. "Ok, time to make my exit." Eiko says, as she tries to open the door. She tries for a few moments, but it doesn't open.

"Great, the door must be locked from the inside." Eiko says. She then tries to ram into the door a few times, but the only result is Eiko getting a head injury. "Ow. Ok, this is a problem."

"What the!?" Dagger yells. "Lovely, she just woke up."

At this point, Dagger looks like she is fully inflated. Her body appears to be in an orb shape. "Eiko, what's going on her? Why am I inflated like a balloon?" she asks, staring at Eiko.

"Why would you think I have something to do with this?" Eiko asks.

Eiko suddenly drops the book of spells she was using. "Uh oh."

Dagger waddles over to Eiko and picks up the book. She turns to the page that Eiko had bookmarked. Then, she glares at Eiko. "What?" Eiko asks.

Suddenly, Dagger makes a devious smile. "Eiko...if I'm going to be like this, you are as well."

Eiko panics. "Uhm...I would, but I don't think I would make a very good balloon." Eiko says, as she makes another futile attept at breaking down the door. Eiko ends up knocking herself to the ground. Too injured to move, Eiko has no choice to lay there while Dagger gets ready to cast the spell.

"Don't worry, I'll heal you...after you become a balloon." Dagger says.
1411.title: What goes around...

14111.content:
Dagger casts the spell on Eiko. Soon, Eiko's small body begins to swell up. Within a few moments, Eiko is as big and round as Dagger is. (They both are around five feet round)

Dagger chuckles. "You really do make a nice balloon." she says. "Oh, wait, I still have to heal you." she says. "Cure!" Dagger yells, invoking the spell. Suddenly, the marks from Eiko's injuries fade away. "There, all better." Dagger says.

Eiko groans. "No, not all better. I can't move that well. I was smaller to begin with, after all." Eiko manages to get on her feet, which are a couple of the few parts of her body that didn't get inflated.

Dagger giggles. "Hum...I could make you a little smaller."

Eiko looks at Dagger confused. "Why is she helping me out. I did inflate her, after all. If anything, she should be trying to inflate me so much that I end up popping." she thinks to herself. Just as she finishes her self talk, Eiko begins to deflate a bit, just enought so that she is still mostly round, yet can walk around a bit.

"Hey, what gives, Dagger? Why are you making sure this isn't the worst experience of my life?"

Dagger chuckles. "Well, it certainly isn't the worst experience of my life."

Eiko's eyes widen. "Holy cow, does that mean she actually likes this?"

Eiko's question is quickly answered when Dagger give Eiko a hug.

"Thank you Eiko." Dagger says.

Eiko sweatdrops. "Thank me? Thank me for what? I turned you into a human balloon."

Dagger giggles. "Exactly. Ever since I was your age, I wondered what it would be like to be inflated like a balloon."

"Right...and this fantasy of your's includes me, how?" asks Eiko.

"It doesn't, really. I just wanted to share my experiance with you. After all, you did inflate me, so think of it as getting repaid." Dagger says, smiling.

"Uhm...I never really wanted to be a balloon..." Eiko says.

Dagger chuckles innocently. "Well, I never found a way to reverse the spell in the book, so I don't think you have much of a choice."

Eiko facefaults. "You mean I'm stuck like this?" Eiko says.

"Pretty much, but look on the bright side. At least you don't have to be the only human balloon."

Eiko giggles. "You have a point."

Dagger nods. "Besides, I'm sure you'll, ahem, 'grow' to like it as well."

"Ehe he he...no." Eiko says. "Anyway, jokes aside, what are we going to do?"
14111.title: Opening Up.

141111.content:
Dagger picks up the book, and looks through it. "Hum...no...no...yes! Now let's see...can it be reverted...good, it can!" Dagger says.

"Are you gonna use it on me, or yourself?" Eiko asks.

Dagger chuckles. "I'll use it on you if you think you'll like what will result. But as for me, it sounds like fun."

Dagger mutters some words. Dagger starts to inflate a little more, first her hands and feet sink into her body, but then her head begins to sink in as well.

Eiko gasps as she watches Dagger turn into a ball, literally.

Eiko looks Dagger over. She notices that Dagger's face is placed on what could be considered the 'front' of her. Dagger's short hair hangs down from a large patch on the top. Somehow, Dagger remains completely clothed.

"Uhm...so...what's it like?" Eiko finally manages to say.

Dagger chuckles. "It's like you are now, but apply the feeling to every inch of your body." Dagger smiles. "So, you wanna be a ball, too?"

Eiko giggle. "Well...it sounds fun..." (complete the sentence fun!)
141111.title: Human Balloon to Human Ball.

choices: They just wander around for a while.
They find some place where they can get even bigger.
1411112.content:
"...sure!" exclaims Eiko.

Dagger smiles and murmurs the spell to herself. The familiar sound of hissing is heard, and Eiko smiles as her head, hands, and feet sink into her body.

Within moments, Eiko looks just as round as Dagger is.

Eiko giggles. "This is wonderful!" she yells.

"Shh! Calm down a bit, Eiko. You don't want the guard to come in here and see us like this, do you? At least, not until we're ready, right?"

Eiko nods. "Good point. But won't they check the room when they notice that you haven't left for a while?"

"Darn. I haven't thought of that. Well, I don't know what to do." Dagger says.

Eiko thinks for a moment. "I wonder..." she says. A few moments later, Eiko rolls forward.

"Hey, Dagger. I got it." Eiko says. "Just think about moving in any direction, and you'll go that way." Eiko explains.

Dagger does so, and soon, she's moving forward too...
1411112.title: Rounded and Rolling

choices: A gust of wind carries Eiko out through an open window
1412.content:
A PING! was heard, but nothing happened to Dagger...

"...?" Eiko was confused until...

...hissssssssss...

...she realised the hiss was coming from herself...

"Oh, this can't be good." Eiko said, starting to swell up, filling with air like a balloon. "Oh boy... Heeeeeeeeeelp!" Eiko continued swelling, becoming very round.
1412.title: Back At You, Eiko

choices: Dagger has some fun with Eiko...
14121.content:
Dagger mumbles. "Ugh...what was that..." she says to herself.

Eiko notices that Dagger is waking up. "Great! How am I going to get out of this one?" Eiko thinks to herself.

Dagger is out of the bed. "Eiko, what are you doing in my room...and what is happening to you?"

Eiko sweatdrops. "Happening, what do you mean? I feel perfectly normal..." Eiko says.

"Well, your round, for one thing." Dagger says.

"Round? Oh, you mean this...yea, I just had a large meal...yea." says Eiko.

Dagger picks up the magic book Eiko was using. "You had a large meal."

"Fudge." Eiko says.

"Fudge is right." Dagger says.

"Yea! Fudge! I love it! I think I'll go have some." Eiko says, as she head to the door as well as she can. However, Dagger beats her to the door and bars it shut.

"Come on, Eiko. You like to have fun, right?" So...let's have some...fun." Dagger says, holding the book.

Eiko backs away from Dagger, nervously. "Uhm...what kind of fun?" Eiko says.
14121.title: Trouble.

141211.content:
Dagger chuckles. "First of all, I don't really want to clean up the mess that could result from you popping...so let's try to see if there is a spell in this book that might fix that." she says, thumbing through the book. "Ah, what do you know, right next to the inflation spell. How very smart of the author."

Eiko nods. "Yea, smart."

Dagger reads the instructions, mutters a few words to herself, then casts the spell on Eiko. Her skin appears to get shiny like rubber. "Perfect, now I can get you really big without you popping on me." she says.

Eiko puts her hands on her bulging waist. "Come on, I was only going to inflate you a little bit!"

Dagger smiles. "So? You look better as a large balloon. And you would proabally inflate better as well."

"Are you suggesting that I-" Eiko starts. "Huph, if I wasn't at your mercy..." Eiko says.

Dagger chuckles. "Exactly. Now, should I really get you big, or should I just mess with you?" Dagger asks herself.
141211.title: Choices, choices...

1412112.content:
"I've got an idea!" Dagger says.

"Does it involve leting me leave?" Eiko asks.

Dagger chuckles. "You wish. Anyway, I'd rather show you what it is than tell you."

Eiko thinks to herself. "Great, she's not even gonna tell me what she want's to do to me..."

Dagger casts the spell on Eiko. Eiko starts to swell up again. As she approaches five feet in width, something a bit more unusual happens to Eiko. Her hands and feet begin to be absorbed by her expanding body as well.

When Eiko reaches five feet in size, she stops inflating. At this point, the only part of her that hasn't been inflated was her head.

"Oh my...I'm a ball..." Eiko says.

Dagger chuckles. "I figured that if you were going to be a balloon, you might as well be nothing more than a round ball with a head."

"This feels wierd..." Eiko says.

"Don't worry Eiko, you'll have a long time to get used to it." Dagger says.

"I knew I shouldn't have done this..." Eiko thought. "...now I'm stuck as like this."

Dagger chuckles. "What can I do with you now?"
1412112.title: Extreme Roundness

14121121.content:
Dagger yawns. "You know, you did wake me up from a really good nap...and I am still a bit sleepy."

"Don't let me me stop you, Dagger." Eiko says.

Dagger nods. "You would probably make a much better bed than the one I have now."

Eiko giggles. "Like I said, don't let me stop you."

"Don't worry, you won't." Dagger says, as she casts another spell on Eiko. Eiko quickly grows to about 8 feet wide. Dagger rolls Eiko close to her bed, turns her so that Eiko is looking up at the ceiling, and then looks her over. "A bit high, but I'll manage. Besides, it'll keep you from getting away until I'm done with you." Dagger says, as she crawls on top of what would have passed as Eiko's belly, then lays down, sinking in quite a bit. Dagger soon falls asleep.

"This has been a really weird day..." Eiko thinks to herself. Then she giggles. "Who know's? I might end up getting used to this after all." Eiko thinks to herself, as she nods off too.
14121121.title: Eiko the Queen Sized Bed.

choices: Kinda like a hot air balloon.
141211211.content:
The next morning, Eiko wakes up. She notices that she is no longer inflated. "Hum...maybe it was just a dream?"

Dagger stands above Eiko. "No, I just thought you deserved a little break for being such a good bed."

Dagger hands Eiko a mirror. "Look at your face." she says.

Eiko nods and does so. She notices that her skin still has a rubbery sheen. "Oh, I'm still a balloon, but not round."

Dagger nods. "I couldn't get you out of the castle unless I made you a little smaller. After all, our next little activity is going to require us to be outside."

"Next activity?" Eiko asks.

"Think about it, what can a balloon do outdoors that it can't do indoors?" Dagger says.

Eiko's eyes widen. "You can't be serious...I'll be blow around in the air forever if you do that!"

Dagger shakes her head. "Relax. I won't let that happen to you...Uncle Cid would kill me if I did that. Besides, then I wouldn't have you around to play with anymore."

Eiko stands up. "Well, how are you going to make me float without sending me high into the atmosphere?" she asks.

Dagger chuckles. "I didn't say you were not going to float high into the sky. I'm going to go with you, so I can bring you down when I want to."

"Whoa, you're thinking about inflating yourself?" Eiko asks.

"No, altough you probally wish it was me instead of you. I'm just going to ride on top of you." Dagger replies.

"Oh." Eiko says. "Well, when are we going to go?"

Dagger smiles. "You wanting to get it over with, or what?"

"No...you see...like you said...I'm starting to like being a balloon girl." Eiko says, giggling a little between pauses.

Dagger hugs Eiko. "That's good. Because I don't intend to stop 'playing' with you anytime soon."

Eiko grins. "Ok, are we going, or not?"

Dagger nods. "Sure."

---

Later, in a large grassland fairly far from Alexandria...

"Alright, you ready?" Dagger says, as she holds the magic book.

Eiko nods. "I've been ready. Balloon me."

Dagger says something quietly to herself. In moments, Eiko starts to blow up like a balloon. Like the previous day, Eiko inflates until Eiko is just an orb with a head.

"Cool, I'm a balloon again." Eiko says, grinning.

Now...how should I do this...
141211211.title: Flight Preperations

1412112112.content:
"Hum...now, how can I do this so it's not just like riding on an airship..." Dagger thinks.

Eiko comes up with an idea. "Hey, maybe you could make it so you hang down from some ropes."

Dagger smiles. "I like the way you think Eiko."

---

A little time passes. Dagger had the top of Eiko tied up in some special ropes that stretch. Dagger was tied up is such a way that it was more like she was hooked up to a parachute.

Eiko smiles. "Alright. Let's go!"

Dagger nods and casts a spell on Eiko. Eiko instantly starts to swell up, and very quickly at that. Within a minute, Eiko had swelled from 5 feet to 25 feet.

As Eiko floated into the air, Dagger was lifted into the air with her. "You holding up ok, Eiko?" Dagger says.

"Yea! I couldn't feel better!" Eiko says. Eiko looks a lot like a big red balloon with some yellow at the end. Eiko swells to 50 feet in the next minute.

"Uhm, Dagger, how big are you gonna make me?" Eiko asks.

"The spell I used on you should make you around 100 feet. Forturnately, the spell won't allow you to get any bigger than that." Dagger says.

Eiko continues to bloat until she is 100 feet, then she stops. When Eiko stops inflating, she and Dagger are about 1000 feet above the ground.

Dagger looks up. "Wow, if I didn't know any better, I'd really think you were a balloon!"

Eiko giggles. The once small girl was now so wide that she would be easily confused for a balloon.

"Hey, Dagger, floating around is fun and all, but don't you wanna move around as well?" Eiko says.

Dagger scratches her head.
1412112112.title: A Diffirent Kind of Balloon Ride

choices: Keep giving Eiko the balloon treatment.
Make Eiko more like a ball.
14121122.content:
"I've got it. Since really look like a balloon, why don't I treat you like one?" Dagger says.

Eiko blinks. "What do you mean, treat me like one?"

Dagger responds by putting her lips on Eiko's. Dagger then blows into Eiko, just like a real balloon. Dagger inflates Eiko a couple feet like this, then stops and sets her down.

"See. I inflated you as if you were a real balloon." Dagger explains.

Eiko tilts her head. "Well, how about deflating me like a real balloon."

Dagger pulls out a pin. "Do you really want me to do that?"

Eiko gulps and shakes her head. Dagger puts the pin away.

"Hum...perhaps we should keep with this..." Dagger suggests.
14121122.title: She looks like balloon...

141211221.content:
Dagger kissed Eiko again and blew more and more air into her body, soon Eiko was 35 feet around.
Dagger: "Is that enough for you or you want to keep going?"
141211221.title: Ballooning Eiko

choices: Dagger places Eiko in the Dungeon for a while.
1412112211.content:
Eiko shakes her head. "I don't think I can take much more. Please stop."

Eiko expected Dagger to keep blowing her up, but instead, Dagger sets her down and backs away from her.

"I think your skin needs some time to adapt anyway. I'd say that you'll be able to hold a lot more after your body has been stretched out like that for a few hours." Dagger explains.

Eiko nods. "I guess so."

Dagger smiles. "Ok. Well, I need to leave you for a while. Just be a good girl and stay here until I get back, alright?"

"It's not like I can really do anything else." Eiko says.

---

A few hours pass. Eiko waits for Dagger to return, unaware of what Dagger has in store for her...
1412112211.title: Break time.

choices: They find a cell for Eiko, first.
14121122111.content:
Eiko watches Dagger walk into the room. "Well, what do you have planned for me now, Dagger?" Eiko asks.

"I think I'll take you around the dungeon so we can have some fun in there...and maybe find a cell for you." Dagger says, smiling.

Eiko gulps a bit. "Eeee...I don't want to be locked up...can't I just say I'm sorry."

Dagger giggles. "Don't be so worried. Alexandria has the best dungeon in the world. It's sort of like a home away from home, but maybe I should show you..." With that said, Dagger deflates Eiko to 3 feet wide(Still leaving all but her head completely round.), and carries her off into the dungeon.

As Dagger said, Alexandria DOES have a good dungeon. It looks similar to the rest of the castle, and is just as clean. Instead of bars on the cells, a thick plexiglass-esque material is used, with small vents (Too small for even a baby to get through.) on the walls and ceilings as airholes.

Eiko smiles. "Wow, you do have a nice dungeon...I guess being stuck here wouldn't be all that bad."

"Don't speak as if you'll spend the rest of your life here. All you'll be doing is sleeping here. Anyway, we can either take you to our, ahem, torture chamber, or we could find a cell for you..."

Eiko yelps a little, worried about what could happen in the torture chamber...
14121122111.title: Dungeon tour.

choices: To make a balloon animal of her.
Just for the sake of doing something different.
141211221112.content:
When they get to the torture chamber, Eiko fears are pretty much put the rest, as the only thing in the room is a rack. Being made of rubber now, the idea of being stretched out seemed like fun to her.

Dagger makes Eiko depuff until she's back to her normal size, then straps her to the rack. "Hehehe...you'll like what I have in store for you, Eiko." says Dagger, as she starts up the device. The rack is pretty much automated, so all Dagger has to do is press a button and watch as Eiko starts to stretch out.

"Whee! This is really nice, Dagger!" Eiko says, watching as her middle gets longer and longer.

Dagger smirks. "I'm glad you're having fun, Eiko. If being stretched is this fun for you, you'll absoltuely love the next part." she says, and presses a button on the rack, which stops Eiko's stretching at 40 feet.

Eiko blinks as Dagger walks down to where her top is. "Huh? Next part? What's going to happen?" Eiko asks when Dagger gets close to her.

Dagger grins. "You'll see in just a second." she says, as she makes Eiko inflate as she is, which causes her to form into the shape of a long, one and a half foot wide balloon. Dagger stops Eiko's swelling when her feet and hands are absorbed once again. She then rubs her hand across Eiko. "See? Isn't that lovely, Eiko."

Eiko nods. "Mmmmhum. It feels wonderful, but is there any particular reason you did this to me?"
141211221112.title: Long Eiko.

choices: Decides to try this out for herself.
1412112211121.content:
"Of course I had a reason." Dagger smirked. "So you just sit tight and let me show you."

Eiko's eyes widened as she felt Dagger twisting and contorting her body. Though she was a bit thicker than an average balloon, she wasn't stretched to her limit, so bending her body around wasn't too great a chore for Dagger.

Finally Dagger stepped back, content with her work. "There. What do you think?"

Eiko tried to get a look at her new, balloon-dog-shaped body, but the lack of a neck made things difficult. "Erm.. well.. I certianly FEEL different. It's a little hard to see what I LOOK like, though."

"Hold on." Dagger produced a small hand mirror from her pocket, and held it in front of Eiko's face.

What the summoner saw made her gasp. "Omigosh! I really look like that?"

"You certianly do." Dagger said with a laugh. "And might I add, you make a very cute baloon animal."

"Aw, thanks." Eiko grinned. "So, what now?"

Dagger...
1412112211121.title: Getting into shape.

14121122111211.content:
Dagger smiles, and reverts Eiko back into her previous shape.

"I think I'll give you a little choice in this, Eiko. Now, do you want to be something I can wear, or do you want to be a balloon animal?" Dagger asks.
14121122111211.title: Let's play some more...

choices: Dagger wants to be a butterfly too.
Dagger wants to be a different balloon animal.
141211221112112.content:
Eiko smiles. "Do more balloon animals!" she says, ending her sentence with a giggle. With that says, Dagger starts twisting and bending Eiko into different balloon animal shapes.

Dagger grins as she makes animal after animal from Eiko's long, rubbery body. After making Eiko into several different balloon animal shapes, she stops with Eiko in the shape of a butterfly. Dagger seems to be satified with this shape. "Ooh...what do you think of being like this for a period of time, Eiko."

Eiko's head is at the top of the center part of her body, with the wings being made up of four long oval shapes near her head and two smaller ones attached to those ovals. More of her body forms patterns within the ovals. She can also turn her head side to side and up and down. "Hehe...why not? This form is a lot more flexible than the rest." She says, as she flaps her wings to keep herself floating in the air.

Dagger giggles. "Good. Then you'll be a balloon butterfly for as long as you wish. Speaking of which...I think I'll join you."
141211221112112.title: Eiko the Rubber Butterfly.

choices: 'Merge' with Eiko to become one big butterfly.
1412112211121121.content: Dagger smiles. "Hehe...I think I'll be a butterfly to...but give me a moment to pick between a couple of ideas I have."
1412112211121121.title: Dagger's ideas.

choices: Let's fly around in the sky!
14121122111211212.content:
Dagger looks at Eiko, and smiles as she starts to cast a spell. When Dagger finishes the words to the spell, Eiko feels herself reverting to the state she was in before she was a butterfly, and giggles as she watches Dagger become a long balloon herself.

"Yay! We're both going to be balloon butterflies!" Eiko shouts, which causes Dagger to laugh.

"Acutally, it would be more accurate to say that we are both going to be a balloon butterfly." Dagger says, a grin forming on her lips as her body finishes forming into it's new shape.

"Wuh?" Eiko mutters, and blinks as she and Dagger lift into the air, and start to bend and twist from the spell. When the whole process is finished, the two girls have been murged into a single balloon butterfly. Eiko's body makes up the wings again, but Dagger provides the patterns between the wings. Their middle is formed by both of their bodies, being made up of alternating yellow and orange strips, which are both twisted in the middle. Naturally, their heads are at the top of this section. Dagger grins while Eiko looks around in amazement.

"Oooooh...this feels really nice, Dagger...and we look amazing!" Eiko says, grinning from ear to ear.

Dagger gently smiles. "I figured you might enjoy this, Eiko. Now, what else could we do?"
14121122111211212.title: Two girls, one butterfly.
