When Eiko is done, her cheeks are completely stuffed. Despite this, she manages to start blowing into Dagger, which causes Dagger to blow up. "Hehe...it's working..." Eiko says, as she continues to blow Dagger up until Dagger is made into a 30-foot round bubble.

Dagger giggles herself as she enjoys what has become of her, slightly amazed that she's coming out of the mouth of a much smaller girl. "Ooooh...this is rather nice, Eiko...keep going, if you don't mind."

Eiko sweatdrops a bit, but does exactly what Dagger asked...
14122222122121111.title: Exactly like gum.

choices: Dagger manages to make herself some clothes.
14122222122121112.content:
"Well, we can't really move on until you're mobile again. Maybe you'll revert to your normal shape once you cool off." Eiko says.

Dagger smiles. "Sure. If you say so..."

And so, the two girls wait. Dagger starts to cool off until she's back to normal. Naturally, Dagger ends up being completely nude. "Ack! I've got nothing on...but I guess that's not too much of a problem, since you and me are the only two out here."

Eiko scratches her head. "Ya know...you were all stretchy and stuff before you cooled off...maybe you could, for lack of a better word, morph some clothes onto yourself." suggests Eiko.

"Hrum...I think I'll give that a try." Dagger says, as she begins to concentrate.
14122222122121112.title: Cool down.

choices: They find a hot spring nearby.
Perhaps standing in the sun would do the trick.
141222221221211122.content:
Dagger tries, but her efforts to produce clothes from her body yeilds no results. "It's no use...I don't think I'm fluid enough to do something like that..." Dagger says.

"Hum..." Eiko says, as she goes over to Dagger. The little girl grabs one of Dagger's arms and starts tugging on it. Dagger's arm does stretch, but not in the same way she did when Eiko first tried to stretch her. "Huh...you've turned into some kind of rubber girl, Dagger. How...neat." Eiko says, as she grins and lets go of Dagger's arm, giggling as it snaps back into place."

Dagger nods in agreement. "Yeah...it's quite interesting...hum...I wonder...if I was to heat myself just enough, I would be sort of like liquid rubber. I'd still be able to maintain my form, but I'd also be able to modify my body...but where are we going to find a source of heat without having to go a long ways off..."
141222221221211122.title: Stretchy Dagger.

choices: ....I want to be a moon forever!
Nah, It's nothing...Lets try something else!
1412222212212112.content:
While she was thinking of what to do next, Eiko began to bounce on Dagger's soft rubbery surface. "Wooah!! Hehe this is pretty fun. Hmm...are there any heavier inflation spells?"
Dagger's eyes follow the girl as she bounds up and down on her own massive surface. "Umm yeah...let me just remember." She ponders for a moment, then slowly begins to murmer to herself, As Eiko leaps up into the air, she suddenly feels a familiar sensation, her body swelling in all directions. With every bounce she seems to get a little rounder and heavier till she's about 3' round, jiggling and sloshing with water. Eiko giggles as she bounds all over Dagger's surface, pushing in deeply and launching herself high into the air, only to come down again. With every bound, a small bit of water seems to leak from her lips, only to replenish within the bouncy girl back to full size.
It takes a while, but even a bouncy girl like Eiko tires out. She slowly rolls her way to Dagger's face once more, panting softly. "Phew....that was...awesome!" She giggles as she rolls onto her back.
"Yeah, awesome..." Dagger looks down, feeling large wet spots where Eiko's water leaked out, forming several large puddles. Oddly, she feels at peace floating around, her round body able to be seen from the planet's surface. "Hmmh....hey, Eiko...this is gonna sound kinda weird...but...."
1412222212212112.title: Moonbouncing

choices: The book is open to a new spell....
14122222122121121.content:
Eiko does a classic spit-take upon hearing Dagger's words. "A-a-moon!? What about your family, your kingdom, all our friends?"
Dagger shrugs lightly, well as much as she could. "I was never suited to be a queen anyway...it was much more work than I'd ever expected. And my friends can see me every night." She puffs herself up a little bit. "Besides, this feels soo good like this!" She giggles and leans back a bit.
"Um, well if that's what you want, I'll help you any way I can." Eiko stands up as best she could, her huge body weighing heavy as she waddles closer. "What do you want me to do?"
"Get my spellbook, it's in my front pocket." Dagger gestures toward her far, far off pocket, several miles away. Sighing, Eiko begins to waddle her way down, making very slow progress. "Hey Eiko, why not just bounce there? It'd be much faster for you." Eiko nearly faceplants against Dagger's soft body in embarassment, then slowly begins to build momentum with little leaps Her body jiggles and leaks water as she bounds further and higher. Soon, she's clearing miles quite easily, pink rubbery flesh and tight cloth stretching as far as she can see. Soon enough, she lands right next to Dagger's pocket. She leans forward, reaching to the heavy book as she tugs slowly. "Mmhh...easy....almost...got it!" She pulls it out and begins rolling backwards as the book lands not too far from her.
14122222122121121.title: Long distance bouncing.

choices: See how big they can get.
Return to normal and then play around from there.
141222221221212.content:
Dagger smiles as she murmurs a spell. When she finishes, she starts to float over to where Eiko is. Pretty soon, the two of them are face to face, their bodies lightly pressing together due to their massive size.

"Oooh...seems we each have a bit of gravity..." Dagger says, giggling a little while Eiko just looks confused.

"Eep...so why did you come all the way up here? You probably know I was going to do this to you by now..." Eiko says.

Dagger just smiles. "I do...hehehe...and I was thinking about that while I was making myself bloat up...and I'm still not sure what. Though I'm sure we'll have a lot of puffy fun together regardless of what we do."

"Wait...together? You mean you want to do puffy stuff with me?" Eiko asks.

Dagger nods. "Yeah. As I was making myself huge, I realized that I really enjoyed making myself swell up like a balloon...hehe."

Eiko giggles. "Ok, then...so what are we going to do from here?"
141222221221212.title: When two puffy girls get together...

1412222212212121.content:
Eiko giggles. "Well, I actually want to see how big we can expand...I bet we'd get gigantic!" she suggests, smiling a bit now that someone was around to expand with her.

"All right then...let's get to it, then." Dagger says, murmuring an expansion spell. They soon begin to get much larger, and feel themselves drift futher away from the planet. "This spell will only stop when I cast the counter spell." Dagger explains.

Eiko smiles. "Ooooh! That's great...we really will get huge, then!"

Dagger smiles as they begin to expand to the size of a planet. "The only thing we should worry about bursting, but that shouldn't be much of a problem. We'll know when that's coming along."

Eiko grins as thoughts of bursting enter her mind. "Ooooh..."
1412222212212121.title: ...they start to have a blast...

14122222122121211.content:
"Hehe...bursting sounds like a lot of fun! Let's do it!" She says, giggling as she imagines herself getting blown to pieces.

Dagger blinks. "Are you sure? We won't be able to regenerate way when we're way out in space."

Eiko nods. "Absolutely sure, Dagger! It just seems like such a wonderful way for huge girls like us to go out." She says, blushing a little.

"Hehe...since you really want to, we'll let ourselves burst." Dagger says, giggling along with Eiko as the two of them keep expanding.

After about an hour of expanding, the girls feel themselves getting drum tight. Eiko squeals a bit, realizing that they're extremely close. "We're almost there...we'll burst any moment now...I can't wait!" Eiko says with a huge grin on her face.

Dagger grins back. "Yeah...it's getting me excited too..." she says as she holds on to Eiko's hand. The girls grin as they creak loudly.

"This is so wonderful! We're really going to do it! We're really going to burst like a couple of bal-" Eiko exclaims, getting cut off when the two of them burst with a couple of loud bangs, which are really only heard a few hundred miles from where they were. The force sends their balloon-like pieces flying in all directions. Oddly enough, the girls are 'alive', in the since that they can feel each individual piece of their bodies. Something else that is left behind is a couple of swirling lights. The lights happen to be the girls essence.

Hehe! Spreading all over feels so great! the pink Eiko-light thinks. The peach light that represents Dagger bobs up and down as if to agree.

Yes, I'm glad you decided to do this...it feels wonderful to be disembodied like this... responds Dagger, glowing a bit to represent a grin.

And so the two lights begin to aimlessly float around with each other, giggling to each other about how good it felt to burst for the rest of their days.
14122222122121211.title: and they really do have a blast!

1412222212212122.content:
Dagger smiles. "Hrum...if we could get back to the book, maybe we could find a way to have some fun with it. Oh, and don't worry about people freaking out due to our size. I don't think anyone else recognized that you were the big red moon, and I went along the dark side of the planet, so I doubt anyone really got a good look at me." she explains.

"So what are you waiting for? Let's get that book so we have our fun!" Eiko says, while wondering about what fun they would have that would involve inflation.

Dagger nods, and murmurs the words to a spell that causes the two of them to begin deflating. Within a few minutes, they float all the way back to the castle, as Dagger leads them back into her room. "Ok...there, it's still on the dresser." Dagger says, as she picks up the spell book and tucks it away. "Ok, Eiko. We're gonna have to float out of here and find a nice place for use to expand."

Dagger smiles and makes herself and Eiko puffy enough to start overing over the ground. The girls then propel themselves out the window and away from the castle.

Dagger is reading the book as the two of them make a landing in a large stretch of plains that seems to extend for several miles. "Hum...let's see...I think I found a way to have some fun..." she says, as she points out two sections to Eiko: and "Alteration" and a "single part" section.
1412222212212122.title: ...they look for something to do!

14122222122121221.content:
Eiko takes the book and reads the heading for the alteration section aloud: "'These spells will change the body of the target in a way that will either make them swell or change them into a form that has an easier time swelling.'...huh, neat." She says, while continuing to scan the page.

"There seems to be two subheadings, too...state alteration and object alteration...so what seems liek a good idea to you, Dagger?" asks Eiko.
14122222122121221.title: Another choice to make.

141222221221212211.content:
Dagger flips the book around and takes a look. "Hum...state alteration looks good...now let's see...'The spells in this part will alter what the target is composed of." Dagger says, as she looks at the only two spells that seem to be in the section.

"A rubberfication spell and a fruit spell...now...which one to use..." Dagger asks herself.
141222221221212211.title: And another choice to make.

141222221222.content:
No one questions the red and pink sphere that now orbits the planet, although the people who knew Eiko didn't take long to realize that the new moon was actually her. However, without means to get all the way into space, they figure that knowing she's up there is just as good as having her around, or something similar to that.

As for Eiko herself, she begins to come to terms with being a moon. The spell, for some mysterious reason, keeps her from aging, so she remains a moon forever. Fortunately, Eiko is absolutely thrilled with being so huge, so her eternity of being a celestial body ends up being a blissful one.
141222221222.title: Floating Forever

141222222.content:
"The air's fun, but people will worry if I decide to spend the rest of my days floating in the sky." Eiko says.

Most of the air in Eiko's body escapes. When she can't deflate anymore, she is still around 4 feet wide.

"Well...I'm not completely deflated, but at least I can move around a bit..." Eiko says.

So, Eiko waddles of toward her next destination...
141222222.title: On the ground.

choices: An experiment in making a town of balloons.
Eiko's been wisked to balloon version of Gaia.
1412222221.content:
As Eiko wanders around, she notices her surroundings becoming more rubbery and balloon-like as she proceeds. "Wow...I never saw anything like this befor-" Eiko stops walking and looks around as she realizes her surroundings are multicolored. The only thing that looks normal is the sky.

"Oh wow...I'm in some kind of balloon...place." Eiko says, testing the ground by bouncing against the ground. She giggles as she bounces into the sky, then gently floats back down. "Hehe...something tells me I'll like this place...but where is this place, anyway?"
1412222221.title: Eiko's Rubbery World.

142.content: Within the portal... you see two more portals. Hurry and make your choice or you'll miss both of them!
142.title: Pick a season

choices: A bunch of balloons are floating in the air
A strange machine with a nozzle is nearby
1421.content:
Kari, Sora, Mimi, and their digimon were walking through an unexplored section of the digital world...

"I wonder why noone's ever been here?" Kari said.

"We may just find out..." Sora said.

"I'm bored. Is something going to happen or what?" Mimi said, annoyed.

"...Hey! What's that?" Gatomon said, pointing to something in the distance.
1421.title: A different day in the Digiworld...

14211.content:
The girls and the digimon approached the balloons, noticing they were just in grabbing-height.

"Hey" said Sora, "What's a bunch of balloons just floating still here, shouldn't they be drifting off?"

"Yeah, but you never can tell here in digiworld" replied Kairi.

They then continue to peer at the balloons, what should happen next?
14211.title: Approaching the balloons

142112.content:
Kairi takes a tentative pull at one of the balloons. As she does a small digimon jumps out and begins to float around.

"WOAH!" says kairi, jumping back in alarm.

The small digimon looked like a bird/bat combo, it had 5 tails, all very very long.

"Greetings...things and fellow digimon! I am balloonomon, and I have a simple riddle for you" blurted out the digimon.

"I'm not answering any riddle!" said Gatomon, and the others nodded in agreement.

The digimon grinned. "you don't have a choice", at this, it snapped its fingers and the balloons tied the girls up with string, and gassed the digimon. Knocking them out.

"NO!" yelled the girls.

"I'll let you all go if you get it right, get it wrong, i get to have some fun"

The girls listened to his riddlwe carefully.

"What...is the meaning of bananas?!"
142112.title: The riddle

1421121.content:
They where vaffled. Mimi tentaviely said "To eat?" and was scared by a sudden "NO!" from balloonomon.

"now for my fun" it said. It then grabbed Kairi with its tails and lifted her up in the air. Kairi screamed, but was muffled when the digimon put its mouth over hers. She attempted to squirm, but to no avail.

SUddenly, Kairi felt a massive rush of gas fill her up, as she looked at herself, she was ballooning up. after about 20 seconnds she was inflated enough to cover up her hands and feet, leaving only her head.

It realesed its grip.

"What did you do to me?!" she squealed.
"I filled you up with my own special brand of gas, which i can manipulate" he retorted. "Now, time to inflate you!" it gestured at Mimi.
"NOOOOOO!" she screamed.

It put its mouth to hers and filled her full of gas.
It then scooped up Sora and thought for a moment...
1421121.title: Inflation

14212.content:
"What is this thing?" Biyomon says.

The machine had four holes, a flexible nozzle with a strap, and a lever, all on the same side... 'Balloon' was printed on it.

"Look, there's directions on it..." Palmon says.

The directions say...

1. Insert arms into holes.
2. Strap nozzle onto mouth.
3. Pull lever.
4. Enjoy your balloon.

"Well, who should try it?" Kari says.
14212.title: The Weird Machine

choices: Force Mimi to become a balloon.
142121.content:
Kari giggles, and pushes Mimi closer to the machine. "Why don't you try it, Mimi?"

Palmon nods. "Yea, try it out, Mimi!"

Mimi shakes her head. "No way! If that thing does what I think it does, I'll end up being a balloon, or worse! It could make me pop!" she yells.

Sora walks up to the machine. "Ok then, I guess I'll try it." she says.

She puts her arms into the machine, then straps on the nozzle. She then pulls the lever. For a moment, nothing happens. "Hey, does this thing even wor-"

Before Sora can say another word, air quickly rushes into her, causing her to inflate extremely fast. After 10 seconds, the machine shuts off. In that short time, Sora went from her normal size to a 10 foot round balloon. The machine releases her arms. "Whoa...that was so fast my head is spinning..." she says.

Kari giggles. "That looks like fun!" she says, as she runs up to the machine, and sets herself up.

"Kari! What are you doing?" yells Mimi.

"Like I said, it's my turn!" she says. With that, she pulls the lever, and the same thing that happened to Sora happens to Kari. Once released from the machine, Kari ends up bumping into Sora. Sora rolls a bit from the impact.

"Alright Mimi, we went, so now you should go too." Sora says.

Mimi shakes her head. "No. I'm not doing it."

"Oh well, I'm sure Gatomon or Biyomon or even Palmon would like to go." Kari says, looking at the digimon.

Gatomon bumps Biyomon. "I think Biyomon should go first, just because I like the phrase 'balloon bird'" Gatomon says, chuckling a bit.

Sora and Kari think. "Who should go first?" Kari says, while she considers the options...
142121.title: Trying It Out

choices: Either Gatomon or Biyomon goes. (You decide who.)
Palmon Digivolves to Lilymon, and uses the machine.
1421211.content:
Kari gets a wide grin on her face. "Hey, Palmon, come over here!" she says. Palmon nods, and walks up to Kari. Kari whispers something to Palmon, and Palmon nods.

Suddenly, Palmon shoots four of her vines at Mimi, two latch on to her wrists, two latch on to her ankles. Palmon then pulls Mimi over to the machine, then uses one of the vines to tie Mimi to the machine.

"Palmon! I don't want to be a balloon!" Mimi yells. Palmon chuckles. "Don't be silly, you'll like it once it's over." she says, as she finishes hooking Mimi up to the machine. Then, Palmon pulls the lever with one of her vines.

Mimi's eyes widen as she feels herself inflate just like Sora and Kari did. When she's finished, she is released and rolls over to where Sora and Kari are.

"See that wasn't so bad." Sora says.

Kari nods. "Yea. Doesn't it feel great."

Mimi shakes her head. "No, now I just feel bloated." Mimi says, as she rubs her belly as well as she can.

Kari giggles. "You'll get used to it. I know I have."

Gatomon, Biyomon, and Palmon talk.

"I feel left out..." says Gatomon.

"Me too." adds Biyomon.

Palmon smiles. "Well, we can use the machine too, you know.
1421211.title: Won't Take No for an Answer.

14212112.content:
"Don't worry, Mimi. I'll join you," said Palmon, a flash of light enveloping her body as she digivolved to Lillymon, giggling with glee as she moved up to the machine and strapped herself in, placing her face on the muzzle and cooing as the machine inflates her.

"You girls are crazy. Look at you, bloating yourself on air; how can any self-respecting woman enjoy this," grumbled Mimi, looking at her bloated form with disgust.

"Aww, don't be such a stick in the mud," said Lillymon as the machine released her, the flower child waddling over to the other three balloons, still mobile due to being a bit bigger. "You gotta admit it feels pretty nice," she said, playfully belly-bumping her partner.

Gatomon and Biyomon giggled at the antics, then turned to the machine.

"So, one of us next?" said Biyomon, the idea of being a balloon bird appealing to her.

"Or we could play with them," said Gatomon, glancing at the four balloons.
14212112.title: Palmon Digivolves to Lilymon, and uses the mach...

choices: Find someoen else to puff up
142121121.content:
"On the other hand, I woulden't mind being a balloon my selfe" gatomon said with a soft murr, as she walked to the machien, putting the hose in her mouth, as the machien started inflating her. Byiomon giggeled as he watched Gatomon ballooning, the cat digimon quickly got a round shape as her limbs an tail were slowly sinkin in to her growing flesh as she floated up, spitting the hose out an giggeling "Hehehehe...Look at me!, I'm a huge cat balloon!" She laugehd with her squicky voice, as she floated up.

Byomon giggeled while looking at the machien thinking that she should join the othere's or find anothere gilr to blow up
142121121.title: Gatomon goes next

142121122.content:
"Hmm, I say we have some fun. I mean, they're all pretty helpless right now...so we could really have our way with them," whispered Gatomon, giving Biyomon a sly grin, which the bird returned. Looking back at their friends, the two rookies strolled over.

"Hmmm, as mush as we'd like to join you...I'm afraid we just can't let this oppurtunity go to waste," purred Gatomon, the four blimps suddenly growing very nervous.
142121122.title: They play with the others.

1421212.content:
"Why not? I could always use an easier way to fly," she chirped happily, moving up to the machine and strapping herself in. Placing her beak in the nozzle, she waited for the inflation to begin, the machine starting to whir as it went to work

Biyomon squirmed with pleasure as she felt the machine pump air into her, feathery cheeks puffing out as the gas filled her mouth. Then it flowed down her throat and into her body.
1421212.title: Balloon Bird it is then.

14212122.content:
Biyomon's pink body bloated up with gas, arms and legs spreading out in a starfish position and then gradually being pulled into her swollen form until only her hands and feet were visible, then the machine released her.

"Hehe, this feels nice," she purred, giggling a little at her squeaky voice, the machine apparently filling her with helium. She then yelped as she started to float up, Palmon quickly grabbing her legs with her vines.

"Mmm, you two oughta try this," she purrs, enjoying her swollen form. Mimi only rolled her eyes, while Palmon and Gatomon giggled and debated what to do next.
14212122.title: It fills her with helium.

1422.content:
In this universe, it's been about half a year since the D-Reaper incident. Life has gotten pretty much back to normal, or as close to normal as it could get. As the portal clears, we see Jeri Katou in her room, just resting after a long day of school. Suddenly, her phone rings.

"Hello, this is Jeri Katou, who is this?" she says into the phone.

The person calling is Henry. He sounds kind or worried. "Jeri, have you seen Suzie around? Me or my parents can't seem to find her anywhere." he says.

"No, I haven't seen her today, but I'll keep a look out for her." Jeri responds.

"Ok, thanks. Bye." Henry hangs up.

Jeri scratches her head. "Hum, I know it's crazy, but maybe I should look for her..." she says, sitting down to consider her options.
1422.title: Jeri's Problem.

14221.content:
Jeri decided to go out and look for Suzie.

Later...

"I can't find her anywhere... this isn't good..." Jeri had searched the entire city with no luck.

Just then, Rika walked by...
"What's up, Jeri?"

"Suzie's gone missing, and I told Henry I'd look for her... I can't find her anywhere, though..." Jeri said, upset.

"I can help you look. I don't have anything better to do, anyway." Rika said.

"Well, where should we look next?" Jeri thought out loud.
14221.title: It Takes Two

142211.content:
They both walk along until they hear a yelp.

"That sounds like Suzie!" said Rika.

Jeri nodded. "Yea, it must be! Sounds like she's in trouble!"

Rika ran toward the noise. "Let's hurry, Jeri!" she says, as Jeri ran close behind. Soon, they get to the building where they thought the sound came from and broke down the door. Indeed, Suzie was inside, but not the way they expected.

Suzie seemed to be inflated to the point where her limbs sunk into her body.

"Suzie, what happened to you? You look...round..." Rika said. Suddenly, there was a yelp from Jeri, and when she turned around, Jeri was out cold. About a second later, she was knocked out. The light then flicker on, reveiling a balloon factory.
142211.title: Found Her.

choices: Inflamon turns Jeri and Rika into human balloons
1422111.content:
When Rika and Jeri came to, they were tied up against the wall... next to Suzie, who was still inflated. They saw what looked like a helium tank on the other side of the room...

"What is this place, and what is that thing doing there?" Rika said?

Suddenly, the helium tank sprouted eyes, arms, and legs...

"Are you calling me a thing?" The helium tank sneered.

The helium tank was a digimon called Inflamon. Obviously, it inflated its enemies.

"It talks!" Jeri said, surprised.

"Of course I talk. And now you're going to join your friend..." Inflamon advanced on the girls...
1422111.title: The Villian Revealed.

14221111.content:
Inflamon sprouted another tube out of the top of his head.

"Hey, you can't do this to u-" said Rika, getting interuped by a tube getting inserted into her mouth. Then inflamon stuffed the other tube into Jeri, and began pumping air into them.

All Rika and Jeri can to is sit where they are as they inflate. Inflamon stops when Rika and Jeri are just as round as Suzie.

Jeri looks herself over. "Wow...how strange..."

"Ugh...I can't move...too round..." says Rika.

Suzie lays where she is. "I wonder what else will happen to us?" she asks.

Inflamon laughs. "I'm glad you asked that..."
14221111.title: Poof!

142211111.content:
(The girls are a bit older, so I have an excuse not to use Suzie's 'baby talk'. *shot*)

"You just had to say that, didn't you, Suzie?" says Rika.

Suzie shrugs as well as she can. "Sorry, Rika. I was just wondering."

"Well, I think we're about to find out soon. That thing is coming toward us." Jeri says.

The air tank digimon walked over to the girls, then picked each of them up and put them on a conveyor belt. Inflamon then presses a button on a control panel. "Don't worry, my little machine has been tested, so I'm sure it won't kill you. I assure you that no one you know was harmed in the making of this, although I can't say the same for the test subjects."

"You monster!" yells Jeri, as they get closer to the feed end of the machine.

Inflamon laughs. "Well, they don't call me a Digimon for nothing. I'll just stick around to make sure things go alright."

Soon, the inflated girls end up going into the machine. Each of the girls yelp and groan as they go through the machine.

Rika comes out of the machine first, followed closely by Jeri and Suzie. Then, they find out what the machine did to them.

"Oh my goodness, we've been turned into rubber!" yells Jeri.

Inflamon laughs again. "Actually, you've been turned into inflatables. Note the air plug where your belly buttons used to be."

The girls look, and sure enough, their belly buttons have been replaced by air plugs.

"Why exactly did you do this to us?" Rika asks.

Inflamon looks a bit irritated. "I'm a digimon that looks like an air tank! What did you expect me to do, blow up some ordinary baloons?"

"Yes." The girls answer, in unison.

Inflamon facefaults, then gets back up. "Well, I turned you into balloons, so there!"

Jeri raises an eyebrow. "You didn't have to yell, you know. Anyway, what are you going to do now?"

The digimon scratches the top of his head. "Now that's a good question. Let me think about it for a minute..."
142211111.title: Making balloons.

choices: They find a nice, big room to fill up.
1422111111.content:
"Hum...I didn't actually think this would work so well...I need to think about what to do with you cute little girls." Inflamon says.

He snaps his fingers, and the girls find themselves in three seperate tanks. Each one is around 10 cubic feet.

Inflamon chuckles. "Now, let me tell you what's going to happen. The machines have embedded a small device in your now hollow bodies. When I press the three smaller buttons, the devices in one of you will start filling you with air. When I press the main button, you all will inflate at once. Understand so far?"

The girls nod. "Good. Now, I'm going to make you three inflate until you have completely filled out those tanks." Inflamon says.

"What!?"
"Whoa!"
"Cool!" Rika, Jeri, and Suzie say, respectively. Rika and Jeri turn their heads to Suzie, having a look of suprise on their face. Suzie blinks.

"What? It sounds fun to me." Suzie says, innocently.

Jeri looks at Inflamon. "But won't we pop, or something?"

Inflamon chuckles. "No. You three are very special balloon. It's impossible to pop you by overinflating you, and your skin is unbreakable. That's because you three are infinately stretchy. Get it?"

Jeri nods. "Ok, just wanted to know."

Rika slaps her hand on her forehead. "I can't believe you two. You actually don't mind that this freak turned us into living, unpopable balloon."

Jeri chuckles. "It's not like we're getting out of it."

Suzie grins. "Yea, so just let it flow."

Inflamon chuckles at Suzie's comment. "Let it flow, you say? Ok, in that case, lay back, and have fun." he says, as he press the big red button on the remote.

The three girls start to inflate again, as Inflamon chuckles. "You'll stop once you three fill up the tanks, so don't worry about breaking my tanks. I'll be back when I think of something to do to you three.

---

About 9 minutes have passed, and the girls have almost completely filled up the tanks. Their feet and hands had completely sunk into their bodies. The top of the tanks push their heads down.

Another minute passes, and the girls finally fill up every inch of the tanks. For a while, there is nothing but slilence.

Jeri giggles, finally breaking the silence. "You were right, Suzie. This is cool."

"I told you so." Suzie says.

Rika sighs. "What am I going to do with you two?" she asks.

---

Several hours pass.

"I'm back, girls! Did you miss me?" Inflamon asks as he walks in.

Inflamon inspects each of the tanks. "Good. But sadly, my work with you is done." he says.

He presses a button on his remote that reads 'deflate all'. Within seconds, the girls quickly deflate, and are teleported out of the tanks. They appear right in front of Inflamon.

"So, did you three like it?" he asks.

Jeri and Suzie nod. Rika shakes her head.

Inflamon chuckles. "Well, two out of three isn't bad. Anyway, I have some remotes that control the devices in your bodies. Of course, you can use other stuff, but the remotes allow you to inflate without an external source." Inflamon explains, as he hands the remotes to the girls.

"There, now, you girls are on your own. Do whatever you want. And remember to have fun." he says. Suddenly, he vanishes in a white cloud of smoke.

Jeri and Suzie look at Rika. "Hum...you know, if you were inflated a few more times, I'm sure you would get used to it." Jeri says.

Suzie giggles. "Maybe a day or to of us all being stuffed in a room together may change her mind."

Jeri grins. "True, but maybe a little time floating in the air with us will persuade her."

Rika gulps. "I don't like where this conversation is going." she says.
1422111111.title: The Big Moment.

choices: They inflate until they completely fill up the room.
They blow themselves up until they are totally round. (No head, feet, hands.)
14222.content:
A little later after the call, Jeri is taking a nap.

The phone rings. Jeri awakes with a shout, then picks up the phone once she gains her sences.

"Hello?" Jeri asks.

Rika's voice comes in over the phone. "What's up, Jeri?" Rika asks.

"Oh, Rika, good thing you called. Henr-" Jeri starts to say.

"Henry called? I know. He called about Suzie a while ago." Rika says.

"You know where she is?" Jeri asks.

"Yea. Anyway, Suzie and I decided to have a sleep over, and we realzied that-" Rika begins.

"It wouldn't be right unless all the girls got together, right?" Jeri asks.

Rika chuckles. "Exactly. Anyway, you wanna come over?"

Jeri scratches. "Well, I have nothing better to do, so sure, why not?" Jeri says.

"Great, see you there." Rika says, hanging up.

Jeri heads downstairs. Her mom is doing the dishes. "Bye mom! I'm headed over to Rika's! I won't be back until tomarrow!"

Jeri's mom nods. "Ok. Take care, and have fun." she says, as Jeri walks out the door.

---

Later, at Rika's house. There is a note on the door.

--

'Door's unlocked, Jeri. But be sure to lock it on your way in. Suzie and I are in the only lit room in the house..

-Rika'

---

Jeri opens the door and walks in, locks it, then closes it behind her. Jeri hears giggling in Rika's room. "Come on in, Jeri!" Rika yells, while Suzie is still giggling a bit.

Jeri walks into Rika's room, and gasps at what she sees. Rika and Suzie are blown up like balloons, with only their heads, feet, and hands sticking out. Jeri suddenly returns to being calm, then causally walks in, and sits down near the girls.

She remains slient for a few moment. "What on earth is going on here!?" Jeri yells.

Suzie giggles. "We're balloons, Jeri."

Rika nods. "Yeah. Let me explain. You see, Suzie happens to have this thing for blowing herself up like a balloon. She decided to share this hobby with me, and then we decided to bring you into the mix."

Jeri blinks. "Wow. I wouldn't have ever imagined." she says.

Suzie smiles. "So, you are gonna play with us, right?"

Jeri shrugs. "I don't see why I shouldn't. I mean, I'd feel out of place if I was the only girl here who isn't a balloon."

Suzie smiles. "Great. How do you wanna be blown up?"

Jeri raises an eyebrow. "How?"

Rika chuckles. "Well, Suzie brought several sets of three tanks filled with different gasses in them."

Suzie nods. "Yeah. I brought over tanks filled with normal air, helium, and...uhm...laughing gas."

Jeri chuckles. "You really have laughing gas?"

Suzie nods. "Yea, so, what do you want?" Suzie asks.

Jeri thinks for a second. "Hum...helium sounds nice."

Suzie nods and hands Jeri the hose. "Ok, put that in your mouth, and don't take it out until I say so."

Jeri does so. Suzie turns the dial on the tank. Suzie and Rika watch as Jeri's body looks more like an orb with each passing second. Within about 10 minutes, Jeri is filled up as much as the other two girls are.

Suzie turns of the tank. "There, how's that?" Suzie asks, hoping for a positive answer.

Jeri lets out a contented sigh. "I don't know why I didn't discover this sooner." Jeri says.

Suzie smiles. "Good. Now all three of us like to be inflated."

Jeri smiles. "So, are we going to do something besides lounging around?" she asks.

"Of course. I've got a few ideas bouncing around in my head." Suzie says.

Rika smiles. "Heh, good word choice there, Suzie."

Suzie nods. "Yes. Anyway, here's a couple of ideas that sound really fun. This empty room is perfect for two things: inflating ourselves until we completely fill it up, and bouncing around, as balls. Not like, as." Suzie explains.
14222.title: There is no Party Without Balloons.

142221.content:
Suzie sighs contentedly. "It's been a while since I've completely filled up a room. That's what we'll do."

Jeri scratches he head. "Won't we have to get extermely big to do that? What if we pop."

Suzie grins. "The last room I filled up was an abandoned helium factory. And I just filled in around the sharp objects. And I tested Rika a whlie ago, and she fit in the room just fine. (The exact deminsions of the room is 20x20x10)We're able to handle insane amounts of air, for some odd reason."

Jeri smiles. "If that's the case, then let's fill up this room."

Rika and Suzie smile. "That's the spirt." Rika says.

Soon, the three girls have hooked themselves up to their own favorite type of gas. Jeri was hooked up to a helium tank. Rika was hooked up to a N20 tank (That's laughing gas), and Suzie was hooked up to plan air. All three of them had the hoses in their belly buttons, so their heads or other parts sticking out wouldn't be a problem. "Ok, girls. When we're ready, set these things to full blast." Suzie says.

Jeri and Rika nod.

"One...two...uh...hum...what comes after two?" Suzie asks.

Jeri giggles. "Three."

Suzie giggles as well. "Oh yea...three!" she says. All three girls turned the dials on their tanks as far as they could go.

At first, the girls are a little suprised when they quickly swell into completely round orbs in less than a second, but their suprise tuned to joy just as quickly.

Soon, their spherical bodies begin to press against the ceiling, so their bodies begin to fill in the space around them more.

---

Ten minutes from when they started, the tanks run empty. The girls now fill the room completely.

Since their faces are mashed against the ceiling, the girl's voices are muffled. Jeri giggles. "Now this is what I call a sleep over."

"Rika, when did you say your parents would be back?" Suzie asks.

"Who is what the back?" Rika says, obviously not thinking straight due to the N20.

Suzie smiles. "That's ok. From what Rika told me, even if we can't get out of here, nobody uses this room, so we won't get caught.

Rika giggles. "I told you, honey!"

Jeri giggles. "Wow, that laughing gas really gets to her."

Suzie chuckles. "She's practically hooked on the stuff. Since I introduced her to inflation, she's used nothing but laughing gas. Anyway, I think we should get to sleep." Suzie says.

"Yea. I'm getting sleepy." Jeri says.

"Not touching, too full of sleepy, you guys air all around." Rika says, as she goes out like a light.

Jeri and Suzie sigh contentedly and fall asleep.
142221.title: Room Filled With Cute Girls.

choices: Who cares? They'll deal with that later.
Rika stays the way she is. Suzie decides the next activity.
142222.content:
"And what's so special about being balls? Arn't we already round enough to be orbs?" Jeri asks.

Suzie giggles. "Not by my definition. Watch." Suzie says, as she sticks a hose for one of the normal air tanks into her already swelled up body.

"Rika, sphere me." Suzie says.

Rika nods. "Ok, Suzie." she says. Rika turns the dial on the tank.

Jeri watches as Suzie's hands and feet quickly dissappear into her round body. A moment later, her head begins to sink in as well, until all that is left of it is her face, which is planted on top with her hair.

Rika chuckles as she lets Suzie swell to an even 10 feet wide. Rika turns off the tank.

"See. Totally round, Jeri." Suzie says.

Jeri blinks. "Can you move like that?" she asks.

"Nope. That's what's so fun about it." Suzie says.

Jeri shakes her head. "I don't see what's so fun about being an immobile ball."

Just then, Rika plugs one of the hoses from the helium tanks into Jeri's belly button. "It's something you have to experience, Jeri." Rika says, as she turns the dial on the tank.

Just as quickly as Suzie did, Jeri filled out until every part of her body was sunk into her body. Rika lets Jeri swell to 10 feet wide as well.

Rika takes a look at both of girls. Suzie and Jeri both come very close to touching the ceiling.

"So, Jeri, what's it like?" Suzie asks.

Jeri giggles. "Nice. Every inch of my body feels great." she says.

Rika chuckles. "Now what should we do, girls?"

Suzie smiles. "Why don't you join us? It's nice."

Rika nods. "I know, and I'm tempted. But then you won't have a set of hands."
142222.title: Two Spheres and a Balloon.

choices: The girls convince Renamon to play with them like the balls they are
Being unable to move the girls spend the time talking
1422221.content:
"Then again were here to have fun and to heck with the conciquences!"

The other two girls cheer as Rika plugs her laughing gas hose into her navel, and turns on the pressure, within a few minutes she's perfectly sphereical just like the other two. The three girls start giggling like mad women, wiggling up to eachother. The question is what are they going to do now?
1422221.title: Who cares? They'll deal with that later.

choices: Amuro walks in and stops Gundam
144.content:
As the White Base continues it's journey through space, there is a commotionin the starboard Mobile Suit hangar. As it was returning from battle, Kai's Guncannon had taken a hit from behind by a Rick Dom's bazooka. Due to the damage, the Guncannon was sent to the starboard hangar while the Gundam, Guntank, and the two Core Boosters took up the port hangar.

As Amuro, Hayato, and Sleggar left to see their fellow pilot, Sayla, who had just recieved word, was alone in the hangar with the machines.

'I hope Kai's alright.' Sayla thought. Unbeknownst to her, Amuro had accidentally left the Gundam on.

-----

*Activating scan mode.* The Gundam's head moved about and began to take in every detail of it's location. Once the data was collected, it deduced it was on White base.

*Continuing scan mode.* The Gundam continued to look about, until it sighted Sayla.

*Scanning memory banks. Match found.* After the repairs following Gundam's first underwater battle, Amuro had tested the main camera to make sure of the repairs. During the testing, The Gundam recorded two crewman testing a life raft with a compressed air tank. Due to it's learning computer, the Gundam figured out how to operate the tank and how to use it on a life raft.

Focusing back on Sayla, Gundam initiated what it had learned. Due to the coloration of her normal suit, and the Gundam's inability to know the difference between anything other than allied and enemy MS, it intended to "test" Sayla.

Sayla turned back in time to see the Gundam's hand reach out to her. Looking around the hangar, the Gundam located a compressed air tank and placed the tank's nozzle in Sayla's mouth. Sayla was too scared to react as Gundam turned the valve on, causing Sayla's stomach to fill up with air. Opening it's hand up as Sayla widened, Gundam watched as Sayla inflating body began tear her suit open from the inside.
144.title: Mass has a new meaning

choices: Sayla will be fine - Amuro goes outside to talk to Trinity
1441.content:
"Gundam, stop!" Amuro shouted. He hurried over to Sayla, and pulled the air compression tank off her mouth. Sayla conked out, and sank to the ground. Gundam turned towards Amuro and attempted to launch a similar attack. Amuro quickly leaned over and pushed the off button. Gundam completely shut down.
Amuro quickly sat down on the ground beside Sayla. She was unconscious, but still breathing normally. She had completely deflated. Amuro looked at her as she slept. She was so beautiful. When was he ever going to get up the nerve to tell her that?
There was a knock on the door and Trinity entered. "Oh my God, what happened to Sayla?" she screamed, hurrying over.
"Gundam went a bit mental", Amuro informed her. "She'll be okay, I don't think she'll be unconscious for too long."
"Let's put her in her bed", Trinity suggested.
"Okay", Amuro agreed, and the two helped to lift her up. They placed her on the bed. Sayla began to groan slightly, and she soon opened her eyes.
"Oh my God, what happened?" she said weakly.
"You had a bit of an accident", Amuro told her. "You forgot to turn Gundam off, and he began testing you."
"Oh yeah", she said. "My chest feels like there are a thousand shards of glass in it".
"Yeah, he began pumping you up with the compression chamber", Amuro said, laughing slightly.
Trinity turned to Amuro. "Amuro, I have something important to tell you. That's why I came in. Will you come outside with me for just a minute?"
1441.title: Amuro to the Rescue

1442.content:
Sayla continues to inflate, as her body starts to get into an orb shape. "I wonder when Gundam is going to stop this?" she thinks.

Unknown to Sayla, Gundam didn't know how much of the tank to use on a life raft, so it was left to assume that the test was over when one of two things happened.

1: The tanks empties.
2: The 'raft' bursts.

Gundam intened to keep Sayla going until one of these two things happened.

A short time passes. Soon, the tank is depleted of air. Sayla is still intact, if you call being inflated to about twenty feet round intact. Gundam, believing the test is complete, pulls the hose out of Sayla.

Sayla can't really do much beside look in awe at how large she had gotten. "Whoa, how is this even possible?" Sayla asks herself. "I should have surely popped by now..."

She realizes that even though Gundam isn't holding her in place, she is much to large to move around on her own.

"Wait...what were the contents of that tank?" thinks Sayla.
1442.title: Expanding Warfare *shot*

choices: The MS deck Sayla's on is shut down from lack of use.
Sayla tries to hide at the back of the MS deck.
14422.content:
As she recovered from her inflation, Sayla started to lift out of the Gundam's hand. Although space had no gravity, one still had to push off in order to move about. However, Sayla wasn't able to move her hands or her feet onto the Gundam's hand to push off. As she lifted off, the Gundam automatically shutdown, since it was on White Base, and it had completed the test, the Gundam deduce that there was no reason to stay activated.

'Okay, helium.' Sayla thought. As she was lifted higher up, she was able to move somewhat, and ended up being upside down as she bumped into the ceiling.

Sayla let out a yelp. Since her feet were spaced so far out, she hit the ceiling butt first. Plus her inflation stretched her suit's material out to the point where it wasn't any good as insulation from the cold the hull had picked up outside.

'I wonder how Amuro, of all people, could've missed whatever malfunction made Gundam do this.' Sayla thought as she recovered from the cold.

However, Sayla was faced with a greater problem: with her size, how would she keep this incident from the others? Kai, White Base's resident smartass, would never let her hear the end of it.

Sayla looked around the MS deck. At 18 meters, the Gundam was the tallest MS on White Base, but the decks themselves weren't much taller than the MS themselves. They were twice as wide as the MS though. With this in mind, Sayla couldn't wait at the ceiling for the gas to wear off. Especially since at twenty feet, or six meters, she was a third of the Gundam's size.

"Well this is great." Sayla muttered. But things weren't too bad. The White Base wasn't under attack and the repair crew was concentrated at the other side of the ship. It was then that Sayla noticed something; being inflate wasn't too bad.

The more she thought about it, the more she enjoyed it. Being inflated took a little getting used to, but to Sayla, it was a pleasant feeling. Even the cold she was feeling from the ceiling felt nice.

+++++

Choose next path
14422.title: New problems and a realization

144221.content:
"Attention all personal in the port side Mobile Suit hangar." The intercom said.
Sayla recognized the voice as Job John's. "Due to events in the recent battle, the port hangar is closed off until further notice."

Sayla sighed in relief. At least now she had some time to herself.

-----

It had been a two hours since the hangar was closed off. Sayla had figured out how to move around despite her size. But she still needed a way to deflate before anyone saw her. Although, she wasn't too eager to start looking...
144221.title: Just foolin' around

1442211.content:
Sayla floated around the hangar, pondering her current state. There had to be some piece of equipment around the hangar she could use. Then she remembered there was an airpump used for the tires on the Core Fighters; the pump could work in reverse.

-----

"Finally." Sayla muttered. It took the better part of an hour, but she was able to set the pump.

She put the nozzle in her mouth and started the pump, which was a feet in itself since she was too big to use her hands. At first, Sayla didn't notice as the gas was sucked out, but after the first few minutes, she could feel her body getting smaller. Sayla deflated to the point where she could use her limbs again when she heard voices from above.

"What makes you think you left the Guntank on, Hayato?"

"I don't think I did, but I want to be sure."

Sayla gasped. She couldn't be found like this! She looked around for a place to hide, and decided to take refuge in a nearby supply closet.

-----

Sayla sighed out of relief once she was inside. Her body was still inflated, she looked as if she weighed 600 pounds, but it was a noted improvement. At least now she was free to plan her next course of action.
1442211.title: Problem solved?

145.content:
Ok, since the part of the story that had a door to the Coyboy Bebop Universe seemed to be destroyed, I'm just gonna add that here.

Anyway, before you go on, a little information about the two Coyboy Bebop females. (At least the main characters...)

Ed/Edward/Radical Ed - Yes, she is a female. She's a 13 year old hacker genius, and is also totally crazy. She has red hair, and tan skin. She wears a white tank top and black shorts.

Faye - If you don't know who this woman is, you either don't watch this series, or you stopped watching after Episode 2. She really doesn't serve a perpose other than being the attractive woman and occationally helping out. She has dark purple hair and white skin. She wears a yellow top and yellow shorts.

Cowboy Bebop takes place in the future. (2071 AD, to be precise.) The setting for this is the Bebop, a space ship. All of the main characters are bounty hunters, and they all go from bounty to bounty in order to get money. A lot of the time, they turn up empty handed (I.E: The bounty gets killed in some way, shape, or form.)(Whatever happened to 'dead or alive'?)

Ok, before I end up talking your ear off, who should be the 'victim'?
145.title: Introduction.

1451.content:
It's a typical day on the Bebop. Faye is lounging around in the 'living room'(That's my little name for that room they always seem to be talking about stuff in.). Jet, a muscular-ish man with an artificial arm, is making a meal of some sort. Spike is just doing his daily activities. (What they happen to be, I will never know.)

And Ed...is, well, being Ed. "Come on Ein, rise and shine!" she yells to Ein, a small dog. Ein responds with a bark, and then goes back to sleep. "Come on, Ed is bored out of her mind!" Ed says. However, Ein just lies there. "Oh, you're no fun!" she says, as she scampers off towards the living room.

On the couch, Faye is just lying down. Things seem quiet, until Ed jumps into the room and lands right in front of her. "Faye-Faye!" she exclaims.

Faye, who was asleep until this point, wakes up with a shout. "Gha! Ed! How many time do I have to tell you, don't call me Faye-Faye!"

Ed latches on to Faye. "But I like you, Faye-Faye!" Ed says.

Faye groans. "Well, Ed, can't you just like me some other time, like when I'm not trying to get my beauty sleep!?"

Ed nods. "Ed's sorry. Ed'll just go someplace else now." she says, as she scampers of toward some other part of the ship.

Somewhere in one of the hallways, Spike is walking toward the living room. Suddenly, Ed runs past him. "Hi Spike-Person, nice day isn't it!" Ed shouts quickly, as she runs past Spike.

Spike just continues walking down the hall as if nothing ever happened. "Yup, just another normal day." Spike retorts.

Edward eventually comes to the cargo hold. "I wonder if there is anything interesting in here today?"

---

Meanwhile, down in the living room, Jet was serving the food he had cooked eariler. "Jet, what's on the menu, today?" Spike asks.

Jet chuckles. "Just the usual."

Spike chuckles as well. "Lovely, Bell peppers and beef without the beef, my favorite." he says, in a slightly sarcastic tone.

Faye groans. "I'm sick of eating the same stuff over and over, can't we eat something, I don't know, diffrent?"

"Yes, and I know how we can all achieve that: you can stop laying around most of the time and actually help us out, instead of sitting around and doing nothing." Jet says, calmly.

Faye puts on of her hands on her waist and uses the other to point at Jet. "Hey, I do my fair share around here! It's just that I'm a girl, and you are the men!" Faye yells. "And anoth-" Faye is interuped by a loud scream that sounded a lot like Ed. "Was that Ed?" Faye says.

Jet nods. "I believe so. I guess we should check it out."

Spike chuckles. "She proabally just realized that she is insane, and decided to take it to it's full potential." Spike says, half-serious.

Jet shakes his head. "Let's just go and see what it is." he says, as he heads toward the direction of the scream. However, before he can even reach the door, Ed comes flying in. "Hi! Ed just wants you to know that Ed screamed because Ed got stung my something in the cargo hold, but wants to let you know that she's feeling fine right now." Ed says.

"Spike, I think we better check this out." Jet says.

Spike nods. "Yea, no telling what that thing could do."

With that, Jet and Spike leave the room.

Faye chuckles. "Well, that just leaves us girls...try not to bother me too much, Ed."

Ed nods. "Ok, Faye-Faye!" she says.

---

A few moments pass. Faye wakes up from another nap. "Ed, I hope you haven't gotten yourself into too much trouble." Faye says. She looks around, and soon enough, she finds that Ed is fast asleep on the other couch. She also finds that Ed looks a bit diffrent.

"Holy crap! Ed! What's wrong with you?" Faye says, shocked. What Faye noticed is that Edward seems to a little round in the middle.

However, Ed had failed to notice this. "What do you mean what is wrong with Ed? Ed feels perfectly fine." Ed says.

"You might feel fine, but you don't look fine! Look at yourself!" Faye yells.

Ed does so. "Wow, Ed has a round body...that's diffrent..." she says.

Faye looks at her closely. "Ed, is it just me, or are you getting bigger?"

Suddenly, Jet and Spike run into the living room. "Oh, so I see you two notice what's happening." Jet says, seemingly calm about seeing Ed round like she was.

"And you arn't suprised?" Faye asks.

"No, because we managed to take out that creature that stung Ed." Spike starts.

"Yea, and we found out something about the poison it uses." Jet finishes.
1451.title: Just another day, or is it?

choices: It does as Jet said it would. (Start Day 1 of 14.)
Something 'unexpected' starts to happen to Edward.
14511.content:
"Well, the creature has two safety measures. First of all, it fires little spikes at what it might think is a predator. And then there is the second, nastier, defence. The poison causes a gas to be created within the body. This gas is produced in areas where it would cause the body to, basicly, swell up like a balloon."

Ed yelp. "Ed doesn't want to be a balloon!" she says, as she grabs on to Faye.

Faye tries to shake off Ed. "Isn't there something we can do for her."

Jet nods and chuckles. "Yea, keep her away from sharp objects for a while. What I haven't mentioned yet is that the can only do it's job as long as it stays in the blood stream. Once it's out, Ed would proabally return to normal...although it would take a few days after it's out of the blood stream."

Spike chuckles. "Which translates to this: Now instead of a skinny girl running around, we'll have a round girl running around."

Jet nods. "Yes, but if the research is correct. Ed will only be like this for about two weeks, and since she is usually more help inside of the ship-" Jet begins to say.

Spike picks up where Jet left of. "-we don't have to worry about Ed gathering unwanted attention by being a human balloon."

Ed groans, as she rubs her continually expanding body. "Ed just wants to be back to normal...wait, what makes you think Ed will be fine in two weeks?"

"I don't. That was just an estimate, Ed. In fact, I don't know how it might react for human. The research I gathered only related to non-human victims. There might be a more volitle reaction for humans." Jet explains.

"You mean you think something diffrent might happen to Ed? Diffrent like what?" Ed asks, paniced.

"How should I know? I said that humans were rarely, if ever, victims. So I don't know what may happen to you. All I know is that it doesn't seem to vary from species to species."

"Oh, Ed sees what you mean." Ed says, her body now about a foot round...
14511.title: An Odd Defence.

choices: Day 1, about 4 hours later, when everyone is asleep.
145111.content:
Day 1, somewhere around 7 PM.

Scene: Living Room.

"Ein, Ed is not a bed!" Ed shouts as Ein lays down on Ed's swelled up body. Several hours after the incident, Ed's body had gained about 4 feet is roundness. Needless to say, Ed wasn't exactly happy with her lack of mobility.

"Oh, ok, Ein can sleep on Ed tonight." she says, accepting that Ein wasn't exactly going to move.

Spike walks in. "Well, at least she isn't bouncing around like a rubber ball." he says.

Faye is laying on the other couch. "I just hope it isn't contagious. I wouldn't want to end up like that." she comments. "Hey, where's Jet, anyway?"

"He's tending to his bonsai." Spike answers.

Faye chuckles. "Leave it to Jet to stay cool in these situations." she says. "I still say that one good prick with a pin or something should have her all fixed up."

Ed's eyes widen. Somehow, Ed manages to bolt to the other end of the room. Ein gets throw into the air by this, only making a short yelp when he lands. "No! Don't you dare pop Ed!" Ed yells.

Spike chuckles. "I don't think she likes that idea, Faye."

"Hey, how can you remain unfazed about this?" Faye asks.

Spike smiles. "Easy. I don't care about this whole mess." he says, as he walks out of the room.

Faye notices that Ed is still on the other end of the room. "Ed, I'm not really going to pop you." Faye says.

"Douglas, where are we going?" X asked. Douglas, chief mechanic for the Maverick Hunters, requested that X follow him for some reason.

"You'll see." Douglas responded.

The trip took the two to a back storage room. There Douglas suggested that he and X hide behind some of the storage crates to avoid being seen.

What's so important that Douglas needed me here? X thought. The only thing stored here are oxygen tanks that the medical staff used for the occasional refugees. X then received a tap on his shoulder.

"Look over there." Douglas whispered, pointing over toward a clear spot.

X peeked and saw what Douglas needed him for. Alia was sitting in a chair, a in her mouth, her belly full of air. X realized that Douglas wanted to report this, and needed a second person, namely him, to verify his report.

"How long has she been doing this?" X whispered.

Douglas shrugged his shoulders. "I don't know." He whispered back. "I wouldn't have noticed if Lifesavor didn't ask me to check inventory for him."

"I think we should let Signas know about this." X whispered. He and Douglas snuck back out of the room and went to the Chief Commander of the Maverick Hunters.

-----

"...and that's basically it Signas." X finished. "Personally I don't really see a problem. All of humanity has been underground since the Eurasia incident. Okay, so Alia has a thing for inflating her stomach; big deal I've seen stranger things."

"That doesn't mean that she can just use our stuff." Douglas rebutted. Being a mechanic, he had different ideals about equipment than X.

Signas leaned back in his seat. His chair made an annoying squeak sound. "You're both right." He said. "But still, it's not a good habit. If she becomes addicted to it, it'll eventually interfere with her work. I suggest we try and break Alia's habit." Said Signas. Find what equipment she used, then change it so that when she uses it again-"

X walked over to the door. "If you need me, I'll be in the bahamas." He then walked out the door.

She stood deathly still in anticipation, only the hum of the machines breaking the tense silence.

As the smoke cleared, the hunter was finally able to see the crumpled mass that lay before her. Her apprehension ebbing away, she lowered her arm as she stood up. Putting a couple fingers to the side of her helmet, she switched her visor to heat vision to verify her kill. She watched as the reds and oranges faded to blues and whites. It was confirmed. The space pirate criminal was dead.

Samus Aran was the greatest bounty hunter in the galaxy, and for good reason. Where other hunters (and the Federation) failed, Samus was able to deliver, constantly. Countless times she had slain the galaxy's worst scum and filth, whether as a lone wolf or a soldier of the Galactic Federation.

Space pirates were a common encounter for Samus. From her first mission with the Federation to nearly every contract she accepted, she could be certain the pirates were involved somewhow. Her now deceased mark was a scientist for these pirates, which Samus found hard to wrap her mind around. The space pirates were so barbaric, it was hard to think that any of them would have intelligent thought, let alone any advanced cognitive function.

What mattered was that her target was finished, but she would need proof of her kill. Samus switched her visor to scan the body. She hoped she wouldn't have to take a part of the body; it was far easier to find a unique trinket or artifact as confirmation. With her reputation, nobody really questioned her claims, but Samus usually preferred to keep things by the book.

Her visor illuminated a small disc attached to the pirate's belt. Picking it up, it immediately displayed a projection of the now deceased pirate, along with some information written in the pirate's own language. A quick translation showed the information to be an identification and access permissions. "That's enough to claim the bounty..."

As she turned to leave, Samus' scan visor picked up some information on the nearby computer. She approached the terminal, reading what the visor had translated as she walked. Before she could even make it to the console, however, she froze in her tracks. "No..." she muttered. "That's... they can't be doing that..."

Finishing its scan, Samus' visor sent the information to her logbook. She quickly accessed the logs, hoping that she misread what she had just seen moments ago. Unfortunately, her suspicions were confirmed. "Shit..." she whispered.

The bounty would have to wait. There was no way Samus could let the pirates continue...
15321.title: The Galaxy's Greatest Bounty Hunter

153211.content:
Samus had taken down ruthless criminals and claimed numerous bounties. As a child, she witnessed the death of her parents at the hands of Ridley and the Space Pirates. Hell, she had even infiltrated their headquarters, with minimal intel, and slayed Kraid, Ridley, and their leader Mother Brain. She was an unstoppable force. She should have been unshakable...

...Yet the intel she just picked up scared her.

         Note: Full access granted at BETA level authorization only.

         Our initial tests on CLASSIFIED appear to be successful. Increases in size, strength and aggressiveness
         are common in all test subjects, as well as unforeseen evolutions like CLASSIFIED. These subjects were
         chosen because of their resilience, and it appears possible that, given enough exposure, they may one day
         be able to provide CLASSIFIED on any planet we transport them to. Our methods have been nearly
         perfected; we currently have less than a 1% failure rate. We remain hopeful that further experimentation
         will yield CLASSIFIED"

"Everything I've done..." she muttered to herself. "Was it for nothing? Did I change nothing?!"

It hadn't been long since Samus' mission on Zebes. She had single-handedly assassinated Mother Brain. Logic would dictate that, in the absence of a leader, their organization should have been falling apart. Yet, here was an entry, in the space pirate's database, that showed the pirates continuing their experiments and efforts as if Samus' interference had done nothing to hinder them.

"Those bastards are stubborn, I'll grant them that. Still, I need to figure out what these experiments are about. There has to be some way to access the redacted elements of this entry."

As she stood in thought, Samus eyes fell upon her dead bounty mark. It was at that moment she had come up with an idea. She pulled out the identification disc, the hologram reappearing as it was brought into the open. "C'mon, where is it... there!" Apparently, her target had BETA level authorization.

Inputting the pirate's credentials code, Samus scanned the now complete entry. Though the pieces were coming together, rationally it made no sense to the bounty hunter. "What are they trying to do? Why would they experiment on...?"
153211.title: Illegal Experiments
